lines.text: The city itself, within the walls, through magical means or otherwise, there is an interior oasis within the city itself. There is the sand and dust that blows in from the outside desert that surrounds it in Marquet, but there are a number of ponds and rivers and large palm trees and other types of trees that are risen. There are small clusters that form almost minute forests throughout the city, whether they be a park to wander through or a means of harvesting whatever the trees have to offer for the people that live there. But you've seen a number of trees and it's easy enough to make your way there.

Looking around you, you've emerged from the outside of one of the central oases, which is kind of near the Lux Run where you originally entered the city. There, you see the streets are bustling and busy. It's starting to get closer to later in the evening now, on this part of Exandria. You can see the sky's starting to get a little darker. There's an element of dusk that will probably be setting in about an hour. But here you are.

lines.text: Be pleased!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Be pleased."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You guys are all saying it wrong. I don't know why. Vax can pick it up, it's not that hard.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am very smart.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where do we go?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Come with me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as the Meat Man leads you down four or five different streets, dodging through a couple of alleyways and off onto the southern-eastern side of Ank'harel. There is a modest-looking tobacco shop that is in a poorer district, it's a little run-down. Run-down compared to a lot of Ank'harel, which is pretty colorful and very well-kept. So, it's pretty decent, average fare for Emon, considered the poorer side of Ank'harel. But you-- (laughs)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Was that a fart?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's one of the various beasts of burden that you're walking past in the streets of Ank'harel. (fart sound)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was awesome.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To be fair, sometimes the Slayer's Cakes get a little...

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They're rich.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're working out the ingredients.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Ah. Aes. It is a pleasure to have you back."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How are things in my absence?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They have been well. You've only been gone for a few hours, but they've been uneventful."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, yes, yes, that's right, yes. Any new reports of the hooded people?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "None within the town, not since last-- oh, hi, Lionel!"

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Hey, what's up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's good to see you. Anyway." (laughter)

lines.name: JON
lines.text: You want a hug? It makes you, like, super-strong.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Really?"

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Yeah. At least, that's what I--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No fraternizing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But anyway." And he reaches down and pulls a small wooden lever, and it's like you see he's having to struggle with it. And as he does so, you hear the scraping of wood, and a chain-winch going. You watch as one of the small furrows in the back corner slowly lifts up and reveals a narrow staircase that leads down into a subterranean area.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is kind of cool.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: It's really awesome. You guys should-- we should go. This is like our cool hideout.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What was the guy's name again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Doran.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Doran.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Doran, you known Aes long?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "For a number of months, yes."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Good guy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We don't converse often, but he pays well, and the work is-- the work is very rewarding."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right. Does he have a firm handshake?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (stammers)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You should find out. Yeah, no, shake his hand. No, go ahead, right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I do not presume to want to-- I mean, unless you would want to?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay, yes, I am sorry, I do not mean to--"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: In his custom, 'no' means 'yes, I crave it deeply'.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a deception check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Your voice got really high during that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What'd you roll? What'd you roll?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19. (laughs) "Uh. I mean, if you--"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Known him for years. Really.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will just walk by him and go down into the hidey-hole.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. "I think you have some incorrect intel, my friend."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I think you're probably gonna need a new job pretty soon. That was a diss. It's all right. Just look elsewhere. That's all I'm saying.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is another door that is locked. You pull out a set of keys, unlock it, open it. It leads down another hallway, and then eventually what looks to be some smaller sets of barracks rooms. You see a few doors that are ajar and empty with some beds inside. You lead down another 20 or so feet to another chamber. And as it opens up, inside, you can see there are three tables arranged in a triangular pattern, and at the far end of the table, there is a single-- what looks like a throne-like chair. It's very well-crafted. It's gold-leafed in places, it has intricate scrolling on the sides and where the armrests are, and there you see an individual with a hooded cloak and a deep, bluish-purple color with what looks like a red crimson slash design around the back, a number of jewelry, and they're facing away, speaking towards the chair, for there on the chair sits an identical large, looming human male with long, dark hair and mustache, pockmarked skin, and is mid-conversation.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You guys really should plan this out better.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Bit of warning. Don't use her name. All right, so I'll just walk up to them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You walk up to the two of them?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. The cloaked figure is in the middle of conversation, and speaking Marquesian, which you understand, to the effect of, "We've been looking, and apparently all the shipments have "been diverted and held off until--" And hears the footsteps and turns over and sees you. "Oh." (confused sounds)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (clears throat) Twins. Funny.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What are the odds?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Deception check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Motherfuck. Oh, you know, like 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I, um." Begins to pull a small blade out to the side. "I am under the impression that perhaps "one of you is a doppelganger, and whoever my boss is, would you please raise your hand?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I do not raise my hand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The other one does. "Aes, what do we do?" And puts the blade forward, and you watch as the other Meat Man on the throne just says, "We do nothing. I know this man, and we will do our "business. Tell no one what you saw here, but if two more leave, I have been taken by its will and "you'll have to kill us both. I'm just kidding, that's a complete joke. But no, seriously, you "really-- go, go." And the--

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Should I go kill him?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The person with the cloak kind of--

lines.name: JON
lines.text: It's fine, I won't kill you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you. Be pleased." And darts out of the room real fast. The other Meat Man on the throne goes, "Oh, Verath, I'm gonna work real hard to try and convince him other of that."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sorry about that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (clears throat) "It is all right."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good to see you again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: spry. You look alive."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is anyone in the room, now, Matt, besides--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Besides you guys? No, it's just you guys and Lionel.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, so. We can drop all of the illusions. They all know what's going on now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looks earnestly at Lionel.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Even Chod.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Lionel.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Aye, very well." And you watch as the Meat Man on the throne suddenly diminishes into a smaller, gnome figure as well, only female, with short, almost buzzed sides of her dark brunette hair that poofs into a curl there. You can see she's also much tanner than you remember. She is wearing what looks to be a leather tunic that's straining against her rather large muscles for a small gnome, it looks like she's been making sure that nobody messes with her while she's in the city.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shit. Is she buff now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's pretty buff.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You got a haircut! I love it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You know. The hot weather around here is a bit of a bitch this time of the year, so best to "get it taken care of. Anyway. What the fuck are you all doing here?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I went to get them to tell them about the thing that we found.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Right, okay. Great."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I was going to escort them there. Do you think you have things handled if we go for a day?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, that's fine, I've only been dealing with this for the past two and half weeks without "you just fine, no one's noticed, until you came up inside looking the same as me. That's great!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sorry, I didn't know you were throning.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 'Throning'.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, is that a thing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, when we're in command, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's not called throning, don't listen to him."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How long have you been here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Been here? Ank'harel? I've lost track of time. Better part of maybe eight months, nine months?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Very successful, you are.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Not too bad, if I do say so myself."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well done.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This one's almost ruined us a few times."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's not surprising.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How are things with the old man?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They're fine. Talks about you lot an awful lot."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, really?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not true, not true.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Have things been good?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She pats the side of her coin purse, which you can see is rather thick and makes a heavy (clinking) of clinking coin. "Not been too bad, if I say so myself. More than I ever made playing violin."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Profit suits you well.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know if she was referring to monetary wealth, but sure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, if you can't have an earnest relationship with someone, at least she's got money.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's also very hard to put an earnest relationship in a coin purse.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Anyway. So. What can I do for you, or have you just come by to say hi?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I didn't, I came to make sure you were all right, and is everything all right? Have we heard of any other attacks or incidents?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All the hooded ones we've seen have all absconded "over towards the mountain range again."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hooded ones?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What about buyers? Have we had any new interest?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "He's good. He's not that good."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just remind him to put some imperfections in it. He always likes to make things too beautiful.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I will, I will."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why don't you want to sell beautiful things?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We want to sell real things, not things that look like they're brand-new. If things are really old, they have dents and scuffs on them.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Wait, so you're lying again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Modifying the presentation."

lines.name: JON
lines.text: I don't know who to trust anymore.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You should trust me because I pay you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know. Looks like he might be growing up." (laughter)

lines.name: JON
lines.text: I have been eating more.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, I can tell that." (laughs) She sets off the throne and comes up and leaps and smacks you on the shoulder. Pretty good hit.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: That's awesome!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I know. Anyway."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, so we'll be gone-- we've rested recently, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, the night before.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So we'll be going for a while, and just hold down the fort while we're gone. Also, I know it sounds stupid, but can you look into getting a few ducks? Just as pets?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Sure."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, I know. It's just a thank-you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Ducks."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: They have awesome information.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Right, okay. Ducks it is. I'll get right to it. I'll talk to my duck distributor."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just ask, just ask us and that would be fine, too.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Yeah, but ducks will know things that you don't!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'll send some word to the Fowl District of Ank'harel to provide the proper--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's a fowl district?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, there's not a fowl district! I'm fucking with you."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You should always assume she's fucking with you. Every time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Figure it out."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wonder where she gets it from?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Don't you say a goddamn thing or I'll cut your tongue out."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Promises, promises.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I've got ducks coming for you, don't know what to do if you don't show up back here to pick 'em up."

lines.name: JON
lines.text: I won't die.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good. Don't."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If he does, we'll just eat the ducks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't care, then. Ducks are pretty tasty."

lines.name: JON
lines.text: They know all the proper spots.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure. Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right, then, shoo. Night's about to come. You can travel over the cool evening air."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do any of you need any supplies or anything before we go? Are we good to travel on foot?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What kind of potions you got available? Healing potions?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why would I need healing potions?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just in case you run away.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is that a no?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Just in case.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I don't have any of those. But it can be arranged if you are short. I can have my second here look into it for you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have three regular healing potions and that's it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Cleared out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think we're pretty much out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Crutch, will you--

lines.name: JON
lines.text: I have 375 grams.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's gold.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You have 375 grams?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Gold, I guess.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grams of gold?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: They look the same. But I can buy lots of potions with that, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, you cannot buy any. But the Crutch here will look into it while we're gone. We won't have any until we get back, though.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He calls you the Crutch?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The Crutch is my work name. It's what the Meat Man calls me 'cause of my height."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. I see.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So it's a name for when he's ribbing you. Ribbing. I'm just so excited by all the puns that are available.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So no healing, then? Let's just go?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, we have to just go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hold on, hold on." She walks over and starts rummaging through a few small crates that are to the side. She's like, "These haven't been organized properly." Grabs a little crowbar and wedges it in. Pops off the top, starts rummaging through, tossing various things out the side like small metal cups roll across the ground, come to a stop. Pulls out a small, looks like a leather satchel of some kind that's wrapped over the top and the side with twine. Unwraps it. "There's a "few something for you." Sets it down. Pulls a necklace off. "You're borrowing this, but you're "bringing it back when you're done."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Of course.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. Now, which one of you but him wants it?"

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Oh, I do, I do!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay." Throws it to you.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: It's really cool-looking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a heavy, somewhat tarnished silver chain that smells of old ale-stained wood.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Oh, I don't like it, someone else take it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, no, no, I called it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Give it to me, give it to me, I called it as well! Dad, make us roll for it.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Why don't you guys just cut it in half?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tickle-tickle-tickle!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both of you guys make strength checks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But I don't wanna break it! Don't pull so hard that you break it!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's cocked. It was cocked, you say cocked eighty thousand times, and now I'm gonna use Luck, because I wanna beat you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You motherfuck!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, it's the same thing! So what is this, strength?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Strength, add the strength modifier.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, no.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You go first.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, she beat me! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You rip the chain from his grip.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What did I get? What is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's an Amulet of the Drunkard."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's that mean?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You wear that, you drink yourself some fine, fine alcohol, might heal you a bit."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you already wear a necklace? I already wear a necklace, so I probably can't wear it, huh? You can get up. It's okay, you can go. You've got 30 feet!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jack off, jack off, jack off!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The umbilical! There you go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're good, you're good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It turns spirits into potions. That's pretty solid.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Beer, ale, mead, or wine will cause you to regain 2d4 + 2 hit points.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh jeez, that's so cool. Do you already wear a necklace, Grog? Do you have to attune to it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is not attuned. But there is a limit to it, if you read it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, you can only once until the next dawn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So once a day, you can just drink a pint of some alcoholic drink, and it'll heal you like a basic healing potion.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fucking awesome.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Who was out of healing potions?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've got three for the party, it's not for me. I have none for myself.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I know I've been rather quiet this journey, but I could just provide us with a few more, if that would help things--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Tary, that is very considerate of you, yeah.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Is this Taryon?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, sorry, it's odd for me. I will rip off my last remaining potion patch on the robe, which has four small healing potions.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go, so you have-- and the satchel that you received from the Crutch has three more additional regular healing potions.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So we have seven regular healing potions.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, okay, okay. So everybody take one?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have four on me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, jeez. Everybody but Keyleth take one?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I made a few over the break, if we want them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, as long as I've gone one in there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm gonna hand another one to Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll take two.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey, T., are you feeling sentimental, being back in Marquet?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The weather is certainly dry.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You've come full circle.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know why, really.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: New setting.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes. New dynamic.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Your hair's holding up well in the heat, though.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Only because it's under the Helm. Believe me, it's a nightmare in there if you look underneath.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm sure you look beautiful.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Does it retain the shape of the helmet?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm just holding this necklace. I have a necklace on, I can't wear it.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: I thought you were giving it to him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you wear it?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: To Gog over there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I'm not wearing a necklace.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well then, let me give it to you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I didn't actually want it. I just wanted to best you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, now you have it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can actually use it, though.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I have the thingie?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're not giving it to me?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thought you said you already wore a necklace!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No. No! I mean, I wear, like, ears and fingers and toes around my neck, but you can always accessorize some more, fuck, shit! I'm the only one that walks around with alcohol on me all the time, anyway.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So wait, can he combo-use that and be like fine wine and chug it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Any relatively alcoholic drink labeled on the thing, he can drink a pint of.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A pint, though, Grog? A pint? You'd snort that up your left nostril, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. It's like a little traveler's bottle of soap.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, that's like you sneezing into a bottle.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Do you have an extra necklace that turns chocolate milk into, like, healing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'll put the word out for you. See what we can find."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are we heading out immediately?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's nothing to wait for.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I actually do have a necklace. I have an old necklace.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What are we talking about now?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Everybody went from no potions to, well, I've got this, I've got this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know why I asked for potions when we had four fucking potions.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It might be that thing that I got rid of.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I had an old card that was the necklace that gave +1 to attack and damage while--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's an attunement item. We don't need that shit. Let's go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right. Sorry your employer overruled me, Kord. Or Card. Or Chode.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Lionel.

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you guys feel a warm, magical effect go through you. As you're concentrating, consider yourself being a cloud, you are the cloud. You open your eyes, Lionel, and you look, and you are a fucking cloud! You're like 20 feet up!

lines.name: JON

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you do that, you watch as more cloud spit goes (fft) and just more cloud. Your body is moisture. When you try and talk, it just goes (exhale).

lines.name: JON
lines.text: So you can't really talk.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Can't really talk. You're a cloud. So if you wanted to, you could spend a minute to concentrate and revert back, and you can do that-- you have an eight-hour period where you can just turn back and forth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should probably concentrate for just a minute. I'm gonna turn back, just so I can shout out, we should all follow-- you know how to get there, right, Lionel?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: (wind noises)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Bob up and down if it's a yes. Okay. We're going to follow you, all right? And when it's ready to land, then just hover down, and we'll all follow your lead.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: (fart sound) (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's totally normal. We all do it. All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So you all go into your mist forms and begin to follow after Lionel's lead. As you guys coast over the upper areas of Ank'harel, it's a beautiful view looking down at this gorgeous city, just this glittering jewel of color and architecture, one of the older cities in Exandria that portions of it seem to have survived elements of the Age of Arcanum and the Calamity, and one of the first societies to spring up thereafter. And it's beautiful to see this history, far longer than that of Tal'Dorei, or at least the human societies of Tal'Dorei, just standing obstinate against the dark oppression of the surrounding desert. You continue to head in that direction, with you leading. Lionel, I need you to roll a survival check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Survival check. We might get lost?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Add that to your survival.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14. All right. So you're traveling at an incredible speed. Like you're used to walking speed, running speed sometimes, maybe horsey speed. This is a very, very fast speed. You're coasting through the air right as the sun begins to set, and the night begins to hit. You keep relatively low to the ground, so you have your Darkvision to see the topography and get an idea of where it's going and the direction. You can look up and see the stars above. You've traveled, and you've been amongst this desert most of your life, so you have a good sense of how to follow that, and because of that, you're able to maintain your directional position towards the Smouldercrown Mountains. You push on. About halfway through the journey, you can see some little flames occasionally in the distance, what looks to be either caravan camps or bandit camps or various nomad circles that are set up for the night where different campfires are placed, whether it's beacons, traps, or just people to stay warm for the evening. You know, best not to stop whenever you see a flame in the middle of the desert. The winds are picking up and getting colder, the stark contrast between the temperature of the day and the night here is immense, and your moisture form takes on the cold fairly quickly, and you feel, even though you're in this form, the chill still captures you a bit as your condensation begins to slightly crystallize in places, but you push on. Roll one more survival check, please.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't get us lost!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15. And without an issue or any sort of a loss of step or position, eventually you watch as the ominous spire-like jagged dagger-topped Smouldercrown Mountains begin to break the horizon and make their way towards you. You're now, at that speed, it hasn't been that long since you left, maybe a few hours out of Ank'harel. So you're maybe around ten o'clock in the evening or so, 10:30. Going to go ahead and move over here to a non--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was gonna argue that since he has the Duck Totem, that technically he would have a natural migration sense of what direction he was gonna go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a good argument to make, but not necessary, but good for holding on to that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, just thought I'd put that out there. I feel like his duck sense would be tingling. Always knows where South is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not denying. Recognized, but unnecessary in the moment.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Unnecessary, but worth noting.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're all just jutting up like these gargantuan spikes that were pressed out of the earth from some sort of landmass shift or some volcanic activity long, long ago. But you can see the densely packed rock formations, and the mountain cluster is maybe, at most, I'll say three miles, four miles across. It's not a very, very big mountain range. And it's called Smouldercrown because the circular pattern of the oval-like pattern of the mountains that rise up and resembles at a distance like a king's crown in the way that it circles around itself. You recall one of three different entrances, the one that was safest that you guys took when you entered, the central portion of the mountain range from the outside, and you guide the rest of them to the exterior of this space. You can see it's a small valley between two of the exterior mountains that collide together, and there is a valley path, where you see a number of dried trees. Some do appear to be alive, Keyleth, though they're designed to weather extreme droughts. They seem to have some sort of weird fruit that they're bearing, dripping off some of the branches, but the leaves themselves are brown and withered and you haven't quite seen plant la-life-- plant life like this before.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Plant la-la-la.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plant la-va-la-fl.

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.text: Oh, not good. What's my nature? Okay, 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16, not bad. They appear to be seismically formed. You can see some of the rocks, the way they rise up in the smaller areas, are at an angle where it's smooth on one side, and you can see the layers beneath where portions of the earth seem to have been jammed, cracked, and pushed upward. But because it's so localized, it isn't like there's tectonic plates shifting or anything, it's not a mass range. Most mountain ranges are long, driven locations that mark where those various boundaries are. This is just a central formation, so you're uncertain as to what the nature of this creation was, but it seems natural.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just lightly touch.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Happy accidents.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Happy little TPK.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Percy, can I have you roll a perception check, please?

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you fall a little behind the group.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Doty has low-light vision, I think.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You eventually come, Lionel, to the area where you believe you found the last entrance. Make an investigation check, if you don't mind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21, okay then. You very quickly look around and recall some of the landmarks.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: I'm still in cloud form.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're still in cloud form. But you see some of the landmarks that seem to triangulate where you originally found the entrance. However, to truly search in this area, you'd have to get low and probably go to your physical form to seek it out. All right, so. You take a minute to concentrate and you revert back into your half-orc form.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I go down and do it, too, 'cause he did it.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're able to see in the dark for a decent amount. You walk the perimeter of this space where the first cavern was, and you feel around, and you gather that there was a path here, but it looks like there's been a small cave-in. A lot of the rocks appear like they've been recently fallen in, and there's some sort of a grade to them where you watch loose rocks have recently been tossed around that are of a deeper-set red color and haven't been quite as weathered as the exterior of the mountain appears to be. So apparently the entrance that you originally used either has collapsed on its own, or was intentionally shut.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: I don't know what's with all these rocks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It looks like it was caved in, actually.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is 100% the spot?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Pretty sure. I mean, I don't have the best memory or knowledge or brains or really any skills, but I'm pretty sure this was it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't be so hard on yourself, Lionel.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does it look deliberate, or does it look natural?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Let's ask the ducks!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are there ducks here?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: There's no ducks here?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Natural 19 from Gil. 22.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: We can see if there are if we Commune With Ducks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The cave-in is not natural. The rocks you can see, the portion of the archway where the natural mountain rock becomes the rockslide that seems to have filled the space, there is no damage that seems to be seismic or quaked, and you can see what appear to be some cleft sides at the edge of this entrance where it appears like elements of it were actually hacked or damaged until it eventually fell in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are there any kind of tracks around, or footfalls that look like it was recent?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll a-- for you, it would be a survival check, 'cause you're a tracker.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And it's a mountain!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I honestly think they might have trapped it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can roll that one again.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll wait until she has looked, and then I'll take a look.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, that's way better! 27!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys are having this moment, and you get low to the ground and begin to read the patterns of the different rocks that have tumbled and left small grooves and a little bit of dust and sand that does reside over this dark, caked dirt and rock, and you do notice a number of footprints. They're scattered a bit, some older, some newer. There's been a lot of foot traffic in and out of this cavern fairly recently, like a week or so ago. And you begin to follow the tracks. Some lead back the path you came, some seem to circle around further into the valley around this mountain.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think I've picked something up. Should we follow it now or should we--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's dark.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: -- camp out and do it in the morning.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Cover for me. I'm gonna drop down and do a Commune With Nature.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How do we cover you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She talks to non-ducks.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can Lionel and I commune together and do bonuses? Can I be like, can you call your ducks?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: That's what I was trying to do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And for a good 45 seconds, 50 seconds, 60 seconds, nothing. And that sadness in your heart sinks a bit, that perhaps Aes, or Scanlan, as these weird people keep calling him, said, there are no ducks here. And you hear, in the darkness, (flapping wings, squawk, impact sound). It runs into the side of the mountain, tumbles down onto the ground. (duck sounds)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a miracle!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It certainly is.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: The duck!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, you can call them to you?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: I mean, I just, normally that happens.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a power, that's amazing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do they obey you, or is it a partnership?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Could you call multiple to you and they pick you up and fly you through the air?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: You guys are confusing me. Look, I just talk to them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know, it's okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's not question this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So which of you wants to commune with the duck?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let the expert.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Okay, what do we wanna know?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How deep is the cave-in?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: How deep is the cave-in? Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To the duck?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They knew about the others.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, sure.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: I ask the duck, how deep is the cave-in?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a chill-as-fuck duck, y'all!

lines.name: JON
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I can tell, his body language is super chill for a duck.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: 20 feet. What else do we want? Do we wanna ask if he recognizes who did this?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's a good one, that's a good one, yeah, yeah, yeah.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Hey, greenie. How-- who did this? What caused the cave-in?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "People."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know, I have a similar problem when I try to talk to cows. They have face-blindness.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm just gonna stealthily start following the path around.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Stealth check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is there another entrance into this cavern?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: That's good, that's good. Should we ask the nearest? Where's the nearest entrance?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Or the safest entrance?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are there other entrances?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Hey, Greenie, how many other entrances are there to this, about?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Two."

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Two. Uh-oh, that was two questions.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is that two including this entrance?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (flapping wings)

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Wait, wait, wait!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Duck Hunt! Shoot it! Vex!

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Meant to ask where the entrances are. Sorry, you guys.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, there is another one. It's good, it's fine, it's good. In fact, I can double down on this. Can I now do my Commune With Nature and see if I can map out this cavern and find the other entrances?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so as you've now sat down, and you focus, you can sense the guardian duck that was temporarily summoned is now wandering out to the desert, probably to dehydrate and die horribly when the morning light comes.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: I don't know about this, I don't know about this. Aw, he's going home to his family.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: In a way, yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Elements of it remind you of Pyrah, though not as visceral and volcanic, but the general heat and barren aspect of the landscape is familiar in some ways. So as you extend yourself, you can breathe and you can feel the land breathe with you, and as that communion hits, you feel you could ask some questions of the terrain.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where are the other two entrances to this cavern?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get, as is the essence of answering these questions, you sense that there is one near the top of the spire and there is one not terribly far from where you are, kind of continuing inward towards the valley. But it doesn't specify directly where, it doesn't put an 'x' on your map for you. You just know that one's towards the top, and one's further around the path you're going.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How deep is the Ziggurat from here? Can I sense the other Ziggurat?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You focus, and you sense that there is almost like a cyst in the ground. You can sense some subterranean cavern. Maybe about 400, 500 feet into the heart of the mountain from where you currently sit. You can sense there this kind of pulsing darkness, almost like a terrible, cancerous heartbeat in the center of this land.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. What else? What's the last one? What should I do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are there any people around?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Has anybody been through that upper passageway?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, yeah, can I sense any other maraudering douchebags?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, you can ask questions about people, powerful celestials, fey, fiends, elementals, or undead, influence from means of other existences.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Humanoids? What about humanoids?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You want to try and sense humanoids? You ask about it. Your attention is shifted back towards that weird cyst-Ziggurat area in the center of the mountain, and the land seems to give you the idea that there are a number of humanoids there right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Shit. Do they look like cultist-y people?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't have a visual. Your vision isn't brought there, you just kind of sense that they're there. They're inside the mountain.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: I could've told you there was people at the pyramid.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, last time. Who's here now?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Well, why would they leave?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, they could leave.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: It's good to know that they're still there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Were there people inside?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A decent amount of people.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So Vex is gone.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Where's Vex?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What did you find out?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A lot of people. There's another entrance nearby, I think further down this path. It's close.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, Vex went this way. Is it in that direction?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What? What do you mean? She went where?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You actually didn't see the direction she went.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do we see footprints going in a direction, though, you described?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Literally, you all turn around and Vex is just gone.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think there's also an entrance at the top of this spire, if we want to do a downward approach, but that seems risky.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's no sign of an entryway visually.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I search for one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do I get advantage because it's a mountain?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do, actually, yes. Favored terrain.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fucking balls. Perception?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Investigation.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I want perception.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're getting investigation.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The tracks end in this general vicinity, and it's just rock. It doesn't even look like there's handholds.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Weird. I wonder if it's an illusion. Can I put my hand on the rocks and see if there's an illusion?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You put your hands out to feel against the rock, and your hand passes through.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What-what! I feel like Vex is really good at finding illusions. Oh, shit! Okay, well, can I put the front of my face through the wall and see what I see?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not a rocky natural formation, it's like it was pushed and carved into the rock, like something heavy or something very focused drove through. You glance over to the side, and you catch what appears to be a face in the wall, about that big around. It's featureless, you just see two eye sockets, a mouth, and a nose. You see a flash of green light. I need you to make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, it's too late. Constitution saving throw?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can we also say that we put our earrings back in the next day?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I assumed you did.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Because we're professionals.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was almost so good, but then it wasn't. Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten. No, that does not succeed.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Curious little cat.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm a rogue now, you guys!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Had to poke it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys hear the gasping as you begin to approach that side, and you find your sister there grabbing herself.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (coughing) Jenga. Not full Jenga.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What happened, what happened, what happened?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't go through the wall. Can I heal, Pike?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes, yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's a thing in there. There's a face, and it sucks your life out. I found a door, though, guys!

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Where's the door?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm not going to tell him where the door is.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We don't see a door.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: I don't see a door.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nobody touch the rocks!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But there's a bad door somewhere around here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's a bad door. Just listen for a moment. Bad door. Right in front of me: fake, bad door. If you go through it, there is a very bad face that sucks your life out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A bad face.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's a door you cannot see, and a bad face sucks your life away.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. I'm going to take my Oracle Arrow and crouch down.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, wait, wait, before you do that, are you sure that's--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, slow down, you're doing all the shit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're going to just shoot something in there? What if they see it fly in?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's why I was going to crouch down and shoot the arrow super low to the ground.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What if they still see the arrow fly in?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, when I peeked my head in, before I got my life sucked out, I didn't see anything in front of me. Did I?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to assume that before we heard her gasping, Keyleth was filling us in.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know, I think it's right around that direction. Follow the gasping. It feels like it's really close to the gasping.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to go check out the top. (mist sound)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Give me shit, and then take off on your own.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I'm not going to stick my face in something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So you fly up. (flapping wings) 60 feet a round. It'll take you a good five minutes or so to make your way towards the top end of the spire. As you're going, make an investigation check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I stealth as cloud?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, you're going cloud! Sorry, I thought you were doing your wings. As a cloud, you get there really fast. So as you make it up there, you cannot-- I will say, for the purposes of this...

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm wind. I'm not going high, I'm going through the treetops.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so make a stealth check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, I will. That is very good. That is a 35.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 35, okay. As far as you understand, no one seems to see you. Make an investigation check as you make your way up the mountainside to check for any sort of entrances.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You should mark off one of your Lucks because you already used it for the day.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I did, it's on the plastic.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Keep him honest.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh man. I love you so wholeheartedly, and on a regular basis you kick me in the goolies. I don't understand it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Good old four-Luck O'Brien.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Seven Luck. It's not per game, it's per day, so if we go to bed, it resets. Fart knockers. I'm doing investigation? That's 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18. You glide around there for a good ten, 15 minutes or so, scouring the edge. All you know is it's near the top, and you see no sign of an entrance.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. So it's not a volcanic hole or anything, there's just a secret entrance.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. She told you there was supposedly an entrance, but you see nothing. Sheer rock. There are a couple of indents that could be cave entrances, but when you get close you see it's just a small alcove that ends.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe you should try sticking your face against some of the sheer rock face.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I land, and say, I saw another face, but I didn't stick my face in it, because that would be stupid.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I wonder if there's another face behind the cave-in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You know what, I should probably find out! And I shoot the Oracle Arrow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You shoot the Oracle Arrow and--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, into the cave-in, or the illusory wall?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How far do you fire it? Is it full strength, is it a lob?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I don't want to go crazy far. I want to get in, a little bit further to see if I can find any more traps, and see how that face works.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What percentage of your strength do you shoot it at? 70? 50? 25?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 65 percent of my strength is used.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see the glimmer of light, and as you watch, it's shifting ever so slightly, flickering like firelight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think there's a fire further in.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Was the face there?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The face is in there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Was it doing the life-sucking thing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not to my arrow. But it was there on the wall.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll go in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, no, no, Grog, don't!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: She got hurt!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, but I'm stacked for days.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should dispel it or something.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: I got your back, Grog.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We've got another entrance.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can Dispel Magic still.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, see if you can dispel the magic!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's see if there's a second entrance.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, there is a second entrance. One is up top.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, they're going to think we're coming in through here, because they know about this entrance. Maybe they don't know about the other one, so we could maybe be super tricky and take an entrance they don't know about at all.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can clear out the cave-in. I imagine if someone is trying to cause an intentional cave-in, they're anticipating no one going through that cave-in, and we can start there.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: I at least know my way in, if we cleared that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Assuming they don't know about it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But they do know about the up. He said there was a face.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: No, he's talking about the third entrance, that's lower.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Higher.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: No, I thought that was the higher one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hang on, hang on. There are three entrances: the cave-in, the one where Vex just got exploded, and one through the top of the spire.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Which I could not find.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Should we take a group look for the top of the spire?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If we go through the cave-in entrance, I can clear it out. I will clear one of my last high-level spells, but Lionel knows his way through that way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but we shouldn't go in the night. We need to rest.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But I can clear it tonight.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We could just make a tiny hole in the cave-in and become smoke and go inside. Is that not possible? He asked.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That may be quite possible, actually.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It would just be relatively untouched.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can we camp out inside?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a gaseous form, so yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We would have to camp inside the cave-in.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's either that or camp right in front of the front door after just triggering a spell.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, Scanlan! We've been so long without you, I forgot we had it!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god, we have the mansion!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, only if you want to. I remember that being a sore spot.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't even know if you guys want me to come in with you. I've taken you this far. But if you need me in there, I'll come.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, you'll be coming.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. Let's make a hole and go in, and then we can camp the night inside.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: I think some of my dead comrades we could use as pillows. They're probably still in there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That may not be necessary.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Body pillow.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm so proud of you! That was amazing!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So what's the plan, guys?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're going to go back to the cave-in. Oh, wait, wait, wait! I did have a question. I feel like it might be smart to get my arrow out of there, in case anybody comes out and sees an arrow.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's a good idea.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But I don't know how to do that. Is there an Unseen Servant or something?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: I'll run in real fast and get it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, do not do that. I, Scanlan Shorthalt, can go get it, if you'd like.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, Scanlan, that's not what I meant.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can go get it if you'd like.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I don't want you to go in! It fucking sucks your life out!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's easy. I'll be there and back in two seconds.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: But there's a face-sucking thing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do I know how many feet in it went?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not entirely certain. I'd say a couple hundred, maybe. 150.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You did 65 percent of your...

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're an expert marksman, you know. Within 100 feet? Yeah, how about this? Why don't you shoot an arrow right now, outside the cave, same strength, and see how far it goes?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You got it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So what's the range on your bow?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's a good question. Fenthras, exalted.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a longbow. It's just a general longbow's range. Do you have that written down?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What? Like 120 feet? Is it that, or is it more?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 150 is your first increment, and then 600 is your second increment.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 65 is like 400 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Approximately, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or the closest wall. Did it hit a wall?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It did not hit a wall.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 400 feet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's really far. No, but how would you do it? How would you do it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have ways.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Could you see through the mouth of this face that you saw, when you were in there?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I saw eyes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There was no eyes. There was empty sockets, a mouth, and a nose, and then suddenly the sockets began to glow green for a second, and then the hit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The sockets glowed green and then I got hit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So you couldn't see through the mouth, it was just a dark maw.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right. But the eyes glowed.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You're just going to go in there, Scanlan?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You want to come?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: How are you going to do this?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The way I always go. Dimension Door.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if it can reach you that far in?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It can't.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: How do you know?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I assume.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, I'm not going with you!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Great.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll go with you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can't.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're too big.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll just go. Dimension Door 400 feet straight in.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait, I'll go with him. I'm going to go with you. I'm keeping my eye on him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. (poof) You guys appear inside the cavern. Darkness. You can see the firelight ahead, the flicker at the end of the tunnel, and you can see the tunnel, the straight portion of it, maybe 100 feet forward, begins to shift and bend a little bit. It starts to turn into more of a natural cavern as it goes. Whatever drove its way in here has merged with a natural path on the inside of the mountain, possibly even merged with the cave-in path. You look on the ground, and both of you guys make investigation checks, if you don't mind.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Investigation, did you say?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm sure he found something. 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's just an absence of rock, and there's a heavy layer of dust on the ground.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do either of you have Dust of Tracelessness?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No. Well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Go back?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah. Let's go back.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Will you hold my hand?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No. No, don't push your luck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (poof) You guys bamf back out of the outside. You watch as Scanlan and Pike reemerge from the outside, Scanlan holding your arrow triumphant.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, it's dusty. Was it dusty in there?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It was very dusty in there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Any footprints?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: None that we could see.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Soft un-tread earth.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Weird.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, no.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What is it, Kiki?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe this is the unused entrance. Maybe the cave-in is the more recent.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I see tracks coming in and out of this place. I know there's people that use this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, fairly recent tracks.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But you saw no footprints inside?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Did you, Scanlan? You should've seen something. Did you look?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That was our mission.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, I was just making sure you weren't going to run away, so I was preoccupied.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: So you guys both accomplished your missions! Awesome!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe we should go back into the other side, then. Unless somebody can just fucking dispel that face, and then we can just go in this way.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I could attempt it. I have Dispel Magic with me right now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do it!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right. I'll do it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is the plan to camp out tonight? In the mansion, by a fire, whichever?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: In the mansion.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to point out, I've already been looking for a way into the cave-in while you've all been being ridiculous.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You've already gone back?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The minute he suggested that he get it, I didn't want to be a part of that, so I just immediately went in to start testing to see if there was ways we could just meld through the cave-in, or if we actually had to make a hole.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you're inspecting?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I misty-ed out of that the minute that he started working on it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you're over, currently looking for a way through?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Seeing if I can find ways through.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You manage to squeeze through a few crevices between the stones and rock, but it's pretty densely packed. You get maybe five feet in before you can't really find a way to get your whole mist form through.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to start, back to normal, at the very top of the pile, looking to see if I can start scraping through using my sword to make a crevice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you're working on that. What are you guys doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we trying to dispel the magic or are we going in the other way? Maybe we should just make a decision.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm trying to dispel the magic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you walk up to the illusory wall.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm having Vex be like, tell me where it is. Can I prepare it so as soon as I poke my head in, I can be like (dink)!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You poke your head in, and as soon as you glance off to the side, you can see the stone face in the wall.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (poof)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cast Dispel Magic... Doesn't seem to have an effect.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Bail. Bail! Bail! Out!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did it hit you that fast? It didn't hit you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There was no attack from the face, either.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I get the distinct impression, perhaps, that you used it up, and probably alerted them that somebody was at that entrance.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's maybe move away from the entrance.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I peek my head back in and do a...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You glance in. No trigger, nothing. The face seems inert.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I peek my head in. Does the flickering light in the distance seem brighter?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fucking shit, motherfuck! Wait, wait, it's a mountain.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is a mountain. You get to have an advantage. That's what rangers do, man!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Was the light seen by the arrow?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The light was seen by the arrow.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So you're looking at the face.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I'm looking in the fucking tunnel.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The face is on the side of it. It's beyond.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, it keeps going?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. So depending on how high her perception is, she may, now that she sees the flicker at the end, she may be able to see something. So how high did you roll?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't see any shift or change.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Should we just go in?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We could.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: So you think the face is recharging?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think I might have used up its only charge, potentially. Or it's recharging.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: It's like a booby trap, used once.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will take a look at it, and look at the area and see if there's anything left to it or other traps further down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Make an investigation check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, if he's going in, Taryon will go in and Identify the thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Go ahead and make an arcana check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looks more like it was prepared as the basis of-- what did you roll?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 17, but I've got Identify.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. There's no magical essence to it any longer, but your arcana check shows that you can see that there are certain small carvings in it that look to be some sort of sigil or glyph that is designed to hold a spell until triggered, and then it's released. Actually, Pike, you've used this once before. It's an actual Glyph of Warding spell that is utilized to hold a spell in and release it upon some sort of a trigger.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So it's one-time use, so we're good to go in this way if we'd like.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does the Glyph of Warding alert you once it's gone off?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't think so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't recall. You didn't know your glyph went off until you found the destroyed body of the prisoner that you had released in Westruun long ago.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, right. The guy that was stealing all that gold.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And then I think we also put one on the top of the loot for the dragon?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's the one that got him. He tried to get some money on the way out, and you found his body blown up and dragged about 20 feet off before he expired.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, I don't think it alerts anybody.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Every creature I choose within 30 feet of me! So, sweet, it's everybody.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. All right. You notice, Lionel, as you guys step in, even in your Darkvision-- which, by the way, for your two human companions, it is complete darkness. You had a little bit of starlight, and your eyes had adjusted to it where you could see the edges and rims of different shapes within the mountain range, but once you step past the illusory barrier into the interior of the cavern, it is just darkness.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is Percy back yet?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, I just got back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Percy, hold on to my waist, dear.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we use our flashlights or no?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I don't think so.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to stay 30 feet in front of the group and continue to check for traps.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so everyone roll stealth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And add ten to it because of Pass Without a Trace.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: His boots of elven...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That give him the bonus on stealth checks?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, elvenkind.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: 30! That's never going to happen again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vex?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike is more stealthy than Vex right now!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's because Percy's holding on to my waist.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I understand. Keyleth?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Scanlan got 29, Taryon got 25, and Doty got a two, but with his boots-- what do his boots do? Shit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The boots give him advantage on stealth checks. He gets to roll again.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. 17! Plus ten, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go. So you guys silently make your way in. I would like a marching order on this, because it is about ten feet wide, this tunnel, and you guys can only go in there two at a time, shoulder-to-shoulder.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Who's got the best night vision?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's got complete Darkvision? Oh, we all have Darkvision.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so Vax and Pike in the front.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Check for traps, check for traps, check for traps.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We didn't take a nap.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you want to stop and camp?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe in a little bit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm all right with the notion of getting a little deeper in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Who's after them?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Me and Percy.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I tug on Vax's shirt just to let him know I'm there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I feel like good old Chod should be near the tip of the spear since he knows the inside of this place a bit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's true. What did he roll for stealth?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He rolled a 28 I think.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Have I been in this area?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You haven't seen anything that looks familiar. The path you went before was a natural cavern. This one is pushed straight through.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Yeah. But I can see how, I'm the only one who's been in this mountain, so there's maybe a little trust. I got this! I haven't been here, but I got it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so do you push your way towards the front?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So, Pike and Vax, as you guys are moving forward, your bardbarian friend pushes aside and muscles up to become the point at the tip of the sphere.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: I crop-dust all of you as I go in front of you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: After that, after Percy and Vex?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Keyleth, and we still have Taryon, Scanlan...

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Taryon next, with Doty with him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Taryon with Doty behind. Doty is going to be two people in the cavern. So who's behind Doty?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, Grog. And...

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Scanlan will be in the rear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so Scanlan is alongside Grog. I imagine you have Trinket in your necklace?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So at the very end, Grog, you're walking, and Scanlan's there at your side, and Doty walking in front of you, lumbering, surprisingly quiet. And you get the sense the reason you're so stealthy in here is because as you step, it's soft. It's like stepping on a bunch of very, very fine powder. (heavy footsteps) It helps cushion your footfalls.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like snow? Or ash?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Like ash, almost. Like a very, very fine dust.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I dip down and grab a bit of it and do a nature check on it? Is it ash?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure, make a nature check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's cocaine!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: First she eats the soul, then she just does a line in the middle of the tunnel. Keyleth's gone off the end, it's really bad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15's not too bad. You taste it, and you smell it. It's not ash. It's very, very, very fine powder. It has an earthy rock taste to it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And are there any tracks or footprints ahead of Pike and I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a survival check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Survival. Ooh, that's good. 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19. You do see some tracks stepping up and down, yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Both ways?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both ways.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Shite.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So pushing forward, another 30 or 40 feet, roll another investigation check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not perception?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not for checking for traps, man, it's investigation. Always been.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21, okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fine, if Matt wants to change the rules 100 games in, I guess so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do not see any traps, anything that catches your attention.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I just do a little, I'm going to scoop up a little bit and say, Percy, can I get a little bit of water added onto this? Can I do another nature check on what this is?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You are fucking fascinated with the god damn ash.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm not going to tell you to make another nature check. You can't keep making rolls until you get a better one. It turns into an immediate mud. It's a very, very fine silt, almost.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What color is the rock?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The powder, you mean?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can't see anything, can I? Never mind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see nothing. In fact, when you say, "Percy, get some water on this," you're like, "What? I don't-- where?" You have to guide his hand.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And is it dead silent in here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's dead quiet from where you currently are. You can make a perception check to listen in to see if you hear anything ahead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24. You listen carefully and you hear faint sounds of footsteps and scraping stone. In one little, sounds like a (whistle), like a brief sucking sound, and that's it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Something up ahead. I don't think we're camping.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If we camp, then they won't find us. They can't see the door.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What do y'all want to do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're on point. Keep going.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I say we keep going. If it's an emergency, we can all jump into the mansion, maybe.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll activate my boots.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Is everybody okay to keep going?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You continue another 40, 50 feet down the path. Make another investigation check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You go a little further ahead and you come upon what appears to be two more of those faces, that are facing the inside of the wall maybe 30 feet ahead. And you stop. You can see they're both facing outward, towards the center of the hallway.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Kiki, a couple more faces. Can you shimmy your way up here, please?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I get down on my hands and elbows.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Percy, spread your legs! I let her crawl through us.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Left hand green!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where are they?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Both sides.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He points it out to you, and you can just barely see the smooth walls, the almost oval, circular passageway, you can see the slight lift of the side rock where the faces form a very faint profile.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I scootch a few more inches and use my last two 3rd-level spells.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Roll a d20. Add your wisdom modifier, please.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just my straight modifier?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't fuck me Gil! Okay, that's good, that's good. 19 on the first one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, roll again on the second one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 18 on the second one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you take a moment (whoosh), the first one releases, and you watch as the face suddenly begins to glow with this dull, grayish, black crackling energy, and then (poof). The energy seems to vanish and disperse, with the one on the left. You turn and release Dispel Magic on the one on the right, and you watch as the same effect happens. (poof) Disperses as well.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, we're good!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (sings) You're the best around! Okay, keep going forward.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Grab her shoulder, move slowly past, pull Pickle along, and continue to carefully search.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You successfully dispelled the effect.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You sneaky.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wanted to fuck with you. You continue pushing forward for another 50 or so feet. You're starting to get fairly close at this point to where the arrow may have dropped.

lines.name: LAURA
