lines.text: Oh, shit, you were right by fucking other faces when you popped in before!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make another investigation check. You're not there yet, but you're getting closer.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18, okay. You don't seem to notice any strange or different elements of the topography that worry you. You push on for another 40, 50 feet or so, and you're just now on the cusp of where the arrow dropped. Make another investigation check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Roll super good.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's at least an 18. Oh, it's better than 18. It is 26.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You don't notice any traps or any issues in the vicinity. You do see the footprints of Pike and Scanlan where they first arrived earlier before, venturing into this cavern, and pushing forward about 20 or so feet, the smooth cavern begins to turn into more of a natural, almost a volcanic tube-type physicality to it, and you can see to the left, another tunnel merges with it. You begin to recognize this. It looks like this carved tunnel is now dovetailing into the path that you guys found your way in, the one that was collapsed on the exit. Now the path that you know and the path you're traversing have finally merged into one singular path.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: I know this place, you guys! Let's go down the left one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shh!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Left?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Yeah. There's one that's-- we can either go straight, or there's one at the...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The one that's on the left will lead you back to the entrance where you first came in, but it was collapsed, the one that you knew. If you keep going straight, it'll lead you towards the light and where you saw these people last time you were here.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: If we go left, it's going to take us back the other way, so that's safe, but we could keep going straight where the light is.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're here for your friends, right?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Yeah, they might still be alive. And I call out, hello?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. It echoes. "Hello?" Everyone make a perception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Right now I'm looking at the back of Grog's ass. But I got a 19.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Natural 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19, you got, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. That's a 34 total.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Everyone over 20, you listen and you can hear very faint voices (whispering), and it sounds like movement moving quicker.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Scanlan? Maybe now is the time for that door.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: For the door? The mansion?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. It takes a minute to cast.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's not going to work. We've got company coming.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How near do the voices sound?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They don't sound like they're getting louder. Doesn't sound like they're getting closer, you just hear voices.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you want me to?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's backtrack to the caved-in tunnel.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Maybe it's my friends. Should we go?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No. Let's backtrack to the caved-in tunnel and set up the door.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You guys go. I'll wait here just in case.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: I'll stay with you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Be quiet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You guys make your way towards the caved-in entrance.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll stay with the two of you because I can't see shit and I'll slow you down. If things happen, they're going to light up. It'll be all right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you guys make your way back to the entranceway.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I actually stay halfway between both.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You stay halfway between, okay. It's roughly about 150, 200 feet this direction. It's a shallower cavern to this area than the one you came through. It's a longer way in, but you manage to find the other end of this cave-in. It's rocks that have tumbled in and clustered. Keyleth, you glance over and you see shapes moving in the light, and as you glance up ahead, about 30 feet ahead of you, you see six figures heading your direction. Humanoid.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's 100,000 dollars, yo. Six figures, moving your direction!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Holy shit, a brand new Tesla is coming this way! Okay. Hey, we have people. We have people coming this way, about six of them. Just letting you know, probably going to be some fighting coming up, and that is your update from the Voice of the Tempest.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm creeping back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So you go ahead and you meet up with Keyleth. The rest of you are back by the doorway. Scanlan, you're taking a minute to cast this?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, you told me to do this, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thought we were not going to fight, but it's up to everybody else.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We may need a place to disappear to, so yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's not a bad idea. We can hold them off.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. I'm out of the fight, then. So I'll start casting and singing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so Scanlan begins working on casting the magnificent--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (sings) When people keep repeating that you need a place to sleep, when everybody starts retreating but you need a really cool keep, let Scanlan open the door. Let Scanlan open the door! Let Scanlan open the door to your house!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as this is commencing-- Oh, I've missed that.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: I've never heard music. I want to stay back with him. No, I'm kidding, I want to stay. I'm still with her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so we have Lionel, Keyleth, and eventually Vax, and the rest of you are still back at the entranceway.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And Percy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, Percy's there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to stand at the entrance of the tunnel and guard Scanlan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Keyleth, you keep an eye out and you watch as they approach. They're in a sprint, a wild sprint. You notice the humanoid figures, there's a lot of clacking sounds, and you immediately notice they're thinner than a fleshed-out human. These are skeletal. They are skeletons in armor with shields and weapons, and they're (snarling) scattering through the hallway towards you at a very fast pace.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Probably going to need some Divine Smiting.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Coming right up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's going to take you a while to get there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As I call Pike, I'm going to go ahead and be like, here we go. (boom).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What do you do?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fireball.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A Fireball!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can see them, right? They're close enough?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For a Fireball, most definitely.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Out of the spire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So. Keyleth, I want you to go ahead and roll your damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Fireball is... Hang on, wait, I'm not a sorcerer. I should've had this prepared. I admit I should've had this. It's something d8? d10's? Fireball. 8d6 fire damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One of them rolled a natural 20.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: One, two, three, four, five, six, give me two more.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was a 19 and a 20.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A 19 and a 20? That's a lot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your spell DC is what, 21?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 21, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so two of them make their save.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You re-roll.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I reroll ones. (counting) 34 damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see this, Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How loud was this Fireball?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was pretty loud. It's a Fireball.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll take two shots at the two that came through.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to curl up to the top and upside-down, take two shots.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: This is with your rifle?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A 20 and a 27 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both hit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Actually, even more than that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Don't even worry about rolling damage because even your minimum damage, with what damage they'd taken from the Fireball? Both shots, you hit them both in the ribcage, in the sternum and the back of the spinal column and they fold into themselves and crumple into spinning pieces of bone. You watch as the momentum of their movement causes them to scatter across the dust. Both of them. (gunshots)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey, Pike? Hold that order for that divine smiting. We're going to need it probably in a second.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm here. Did you save any for me?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There will be more.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think there's going to be more.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I take out my mace and get ready.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: I want some now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 30 seconds passes. 30 seconds pass. Scanlan, you finish your spell. The doorway appears up. There doesn't appear to be anything else currently coming down the hall after you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (singing) Scanlan, open the door.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (singing) Scanlan, open the door.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We going in or what?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You guys want to camp? Let's go.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can we leave something here? Is there some sort of alarm that we can set?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like a glyph?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: A Glyph of Warding?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Like a Glyph of Warding.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes, we can.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Can you put it on the faces that already exist so that they think--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Ooh. Chod!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And an idiot shall lead them.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: What's an idiot?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Broken clock. Twice a day. Well done.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's take a long rest and see if we can get two more.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do notice, Keyleth, that the flickering light, the firelight, is getting brighter. The firelight is now becoming more of a white light, and it's a flickering white light.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How hot does a campfire normally get? Not that hot, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not that hot.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fire is very white. White fire.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Huh.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Feel like coming to the campsite? Maybe?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's start backing up.

lines.name: ASHLEY, MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Back up a little bit.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Are we close to the faces at all, still?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're maybe about 70 to 100 feet.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: On the way back?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're backing up through a different tunnel, so there's no faces that you've seen on this side.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's leave it at the shift, so if they go up our tunnel, we'll know.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Great. I throw up a Glyph of Warding right there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Glyph of Warding. What's the casting time on the glyph?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: A gift for someone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the casting time on the glyph?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A gif of cording.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, that one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can't find the card.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Give me just one second. I don't know if it slipped underneath.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Probably a minute.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Everything fun takes a minute.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Glyph of Warding is one hour casting time.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, never mind!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You know what? We don't have time, so maybe we can just hop into the mansion.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Watch an episode of House of Cards, and by then Glyph of Warding will be done?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Keep an eye. Hop in the mansion?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's hop in the mansion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You all make your way into the center of Scanlan's magnificent mansion. Lionel, you step through this weird sparkling purple doorway that wasn't there before, and as you go through, the temperature becomes very comfortable-warm. It's well-kept inside. It's climate-controlled. There's these beautiful marble pillars. There's this royal red and gold carpet that spreads out over this dual staircase that winds up to a second floor. It's a gorgeous mansion. The interior's immaculately designed, and you watch as about a dozen or so spectral people suddenly float in with their arms crossed and give a bow and a nod to you as you arrive.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Before we go in, will you throw down the Dust of Tracelessness?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You guys are all inside the mansion.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well. That was fun.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's been a while. You've redecorated.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I put some new art pieces in here. They're all counterfeit, but still good.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How's the menu?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The menu's changed quite a bit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, do tell.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Kaylie got sick of chicken about two weeks in, so she's got me on this vegan thing. (sighs) She says it'll make me last longer and feel healthier and stuff.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Last longer?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, you know. Live longer. She said all that meat was probably bad for me, so it's all salads now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Only salads?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. Different kinds of salad.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's it? That's all they make, is salad?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's what she told them to make, and that's what they're making now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But you run the place.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, I don't want to cross her. She has me on a diet, and I'm trying to stick to it. It will be all salad.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is it more tasteful in here now?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Tasteful?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is it more tasteful in the mansion?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is it more tasteful in the mansion? No, I didn't think so.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is the picture still up that Pike commissioned?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, sure. It's there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You didn't replace that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe we should all retire to our rooms for a while and come back for dinner.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is Tary-- does he have his own room, as well?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, that's the fancy fellow you've brought with you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Tary, Scanlan. Scanlan, Tary.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The new Scanlan. Yeah, right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Tary, say hi.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hello! I'm Taryon Darrington. I've been quite pleased to spend some time with your friends for the last year, and it's-- you have wonderful friends. You should honor and cherish them. They are the best people I've ever met in my life, and this is a lovely home you have.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Scanlan, don't be rude. Respond.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (sighs) It's nice to meet you, too. Thank you for looking after my friends. I guess any friend of Vox Machina is a friend of mine. You can use the downstairs. The basement room.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Scanlan, you can add a room at a thought!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He can have my room.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He can have your room.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That will be fine.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Do you have any bunkbeds?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No. I don't have bunkbeds.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Do you have a hammock?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I don't think I do, but there might be some spare cots and stuff downstairs.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Lionel, there is a war room down in the bottom of this bitch.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: War room?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. It's got all the things people like you and me need. We're covered.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Sweet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sand pit, fighting dummies.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Dibs on the sand pit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: JON
lines.text: It'll make me feel like I'm at home.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fair enough.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: There's also the spa, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. It was destroyed but rebuilt. It's lined with iron now, in case there's an explosion.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wise.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you guys all scatter to your rooms for a moment to take a rest?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I guess so.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you want to play some cards or something?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure! That will be great.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Want to go back to, what, your room?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That will be fine, yeah. Let's go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. You guys head back to Scanlan's room? We're going to take a break here. We'll return here and pick up from that exact moment here, in just a few minutes. Real fast, we do have a Wyrmwood giveaway. It is the black walnut complete dice tower system and tabletop dice tray with leather rolling surface.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we open it and see what color that is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll open some of it. I'm not going to open all of it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just one, because it's all black walnut.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And welcome back, ladies and gentlemen, to Critical Role. First and foremost, we have our winner in the chat: AJSparks08, congratulations, you won the fantastic Wyrmwood package. Denovo will contact you shortly to get your address and shipping information. Congratulations, on our 100th episode Wyrmwood giveaway! Also, it's come to our attention that the chat room and the Internet is convinced that this is not a real set and we are apparently on a green screen, so I wanted to show you guys how incredibly real this -- no, I'm kidding, it's actually real. It's a real set, it's actually here. It's a real set.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't fuck up the wrinkles, they look so good in the light!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But I do understand illusions are prominent in magical realms, apparently.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Because of the beautiful spot behind you, can you give us one Vidal Sassoon wave of your--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, because you have a backlight!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And a halo around you, because of the shield!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's kind of magnificent. Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I hate you all so much.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Now your hair is extra fluffy because you did it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: God damn it. All right! Why do I listen to these people?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe he's born with it.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Maybe it's--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vax, you had gone off with Scanlan?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Catch up, play cards.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you make your way to the chambers.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Boy, it is more extravagant in here than I remember.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, to be fair, you hadn't spent a lot of time in my room.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, but there was just one mirror on the ceiling, and now there are three.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I need to get every angle, don't I?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, that's weird. Do you want to play cards?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure. Rummy gin? Gin rummy? Pinochle?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I'll pretend to know what those are.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Spades? Hearts?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's do hearts.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. I'll deal.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. No idea how to play this game. But Vax does!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will win.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, so catch me up, man!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, there's a lot to talk about in a year. We--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What happened in the beginning? What happened right after you left? First couple of weeks?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We went on sort of a walkabout. Me and Kaylie went off to the woods, did some camping. We found some travelers and sang to them, and told stories like we do. Entertained some folks. Some nights were spent alone, some nights in the company of people who wandered by. We weren't too far away from Whitestone.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So how did you get to Marquet?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We got a boat, went across the sea, and we went back to that casino. It was really the only piece of unfinished business from our time together that I had to deal with.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And that somehow stumbled into all this?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, when I got my revenge on them, I learned a bit about what they were up to. They weren't really drug dealers. It's embarrassing, but the drugs they sold me were not real. I know that's hard to believe, but I was swindled by them.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is hard to believe. I don't think it's true.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It is true. They sold me a bunch of shit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, surely not, no.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And since then I've been doing that for a while, and it turns out I'm very good at it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That actually is not surprising.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We don't try to swindle people who are innocent. We started off by taking down-- well, not taking down, but ripping off a few guys who were corrupt officials in the city, and built from there. It's not a big operation, if I can be honest with you. It's just me and Kaylie and a few other people.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, I'm not going to lie, I think it's pretty cool.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you. It is kind of cool. I have this persona, and people know who it is, and when I go places, they're scared of me a little bit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, you did save a fucking continent, you are scary.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It is true.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I helped, a bit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A bit? You've had a year to clear your head, you think it was just a bit?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know, maybe. We all did our part. We all did our part!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know there are multiple times we'd all be dead if it weren't for you. You know that. You know that! And the same could be said for any of us, that's true, but you take any one piece away, and the tower falls. Jenga, man.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So I left.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I admire it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I wish my dad gave half as much effort as you have this year. Or I used to. Anyway, you know, we've missed you. Everybody has.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's not true.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It is true. And I certainly have, and if I did anything or said anything to make you feel lonely, I'm sorry. I really am. Fucking missed you, man.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You don't have to apologize for anything. It was me. It was me, and I don't know if we'll ever have what we had before, but I can tell you that fighting alongside you all was the best time of my life, and not because of the glory, or the fortune, or the fame that we got. It was just to fight alongside you, and to see the looks on your faces when I did something really cool in battle.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fucking every time. I know I miss that flair.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But you've got this new guy, and he seems really-- He's very handsome.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's true. I don't know that we have-- I mean, we've scattered a bit. I live in Zephra now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, really?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm on holiday, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Zephra Heights?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I'm very happy right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You are happy?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's so weird.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I know. I was happy for a long time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But still with the black. You're not giving that up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, this is, no! This is part of the bargain.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, some turquoise could pop it up a little bit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, but you know I have sunshine in my life every day, so it's all right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's true. How's that all going?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fucking the best, man! It's the fucking best!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. But, you know, all I care about is that you're happier now than you were. You seem a little happier.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm certainly better off than I was when I left you all. I don't know that I'm happier, just better off.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, that's a step up. And Kaylie, is she better off?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Most certainly.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, that's great.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Listen, thank you for coming up here and stuff. I don't really know what to do with the others.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Don't scare away. Just be patient.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll try.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Clap him on the back of the head.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can't reach.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I can. I love you, man.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You too. I'm sorry.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's good to see you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're not going to play cards, are we?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know how to play this game.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But thanks for the conversation.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's been about an hour, I think.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, you should just go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I walk away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. All right. If anyone else wants to do anything else before dinner, or after?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I take all the mirrors off the roof of our bedroom while he talks with Scanlan, and then we go to sleep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are mirrors in yours as well?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I assume.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I hadn't intended on it, but there's definitely a mirror in there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Your wonderful exposé on salad types are presented to you by the spectral servants. A fantastic dinner of greens of all shades--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Where's the meat?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's lima beans.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do they serve meat for guests, or is it just Scanlan that's barred?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not even chicken salad in this mansion?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, the closest we have is lima beans.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They know how to make chicken, though, I know the servants know how to make chicken!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If I have them make chicken, they'll tell her, and I'll get in trouble.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Tell her you didn't have any.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's true. I have an idea. Bring me a cow. No, I'm kidding.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The spectral servant's like--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't do it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It worked once before.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They've got an excellent endive.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fabulous.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A couscous. And a tabbouleh.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So, basically, it's one of those meals that you're still hungry when you eat it all.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, it's really not filling at all. It's terrible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And he's not lying.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do we lose hit points from this meal?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, shit, did we say that we have to buy chalices before we have any more fucking feasts?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shit balls.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Said Vex.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're out of chalices!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do we have any chalices in here?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: For what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're referring to the Heroes' Feast meal, but no. Stuff like that, you stock up on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We've got to remember. We've got to do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So the meal is filling to varying degrees of enjoyment, but you find rest at your disposal. Relatively early into your day, though it is night in Ank'harel. You guys have been awake for approximately five hours. Do you go to rest?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, if we all rest, when we wake up, those things are gonna be swarming outside the door, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, potentially, or they could have given up. What if we just peek out the door and see?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can do that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. I'm going to peek out the door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Very stealthily open the door a little bit and see. Yeah, I'm going to stay inside the door but just look outside the door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You peek outside the door, and right as you glance through, you see about 13 or so skeletons that are all clustered right there at the door going (zombie groans).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ah, fuck. Shut it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I feel like that can wait till morning.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think it might keep getting worse, I'm not sure.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe we should sleep.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We wait till morning and we throw Pike out the door.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, that's fine. I'll volunteer.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Can they come into this magic door?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, they have to be invited.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: They can't? Are they vampires?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They're all bones.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Okay. So we're okay. They can't come in.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: For a while.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Is there a back door to this place?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, no.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: So if we wake up in the morning and there's 200 of them, then--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're fucked.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're okay. We have Pike.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have options.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: What's Pike going to do?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Undead is my favored terrain.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Are you going to talk to them?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I could. But what's the point?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Do you have Commune with Skeletons?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not all skeletons are like ducks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, some of them are a lot meaner.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: If we find your friends, I can talk to them if they're dead.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Maybe we can find their good side.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We could turn some undead.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's not a bad idea.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: I'm sorry, I never talk so much. I'm just really hungry after that stupid meal.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Same, it's okay. I feel starving.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's have a nightcap.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They can make you a fruit smoothie.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes. I want that. I do want it. Yes. Bring it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That may be breakfast.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That'll give you the runs, you don't want that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can we put some rum in it?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can you have eggs, or is that not vegan?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She said vegan. No eggs.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This fucking sucks.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A shallow ghost of a dinner served by shallow ghosts of people. I'm ready for a nightcap, and an end of the evening.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you pull out the various bottles you've stored amongst Grog's Bag of Holding. Scatter a nightcap amongst those who wish to partake, and find yourself resting for the evening within the mansion.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: To a death in the morning.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: To a pina colada.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: As we're walking towards the rooms, can I pull Pike aside for a second?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. So as you guys are heading off--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How are you?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, I'm fine. I'm just finding myself a little angry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I think it's reasonable to be angry.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And I'm trying not to be.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a different side of you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I know. I don't like it. But I can't help it. What should I do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well. Your emotions are justified. But you found it in your heart to forgive your family, and they did terrible things to you. Maybe it's harder with people that are closer. They cut deeper.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah. I think it's just because I didn't really know them. Maybe it was easier to just let them go, and I wasn't as angry as I am with him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Have you talked to Sarenrae about it?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No. I'm just nervous. I know what she'll say, and have me do, and I just want to be--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You don't want to do it yet.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't want to do it! I just want to be mad for a while, I guess, but... I don't know. I guess just seeing him again. Slowly but surely, I'm not as mad, but--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's still charming.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: He's making me feel so many different kinds of emotions. I'm confused.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Probably a battle of some sort, which is usually life-endangering. Just ask yourself if you would want to die without saying how you feel.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. That's a good idea. I would feel very bad if something happened to him and I didn't say anything. I mean, if I died, then I just wouldn't know, I guess.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I just spit on you, I'm sorry.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's fine, I don't care. Okay. Well, that's true. Thank you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's hard.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I know. It is hard.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, you know, if you feel like staying up and wandering around and talking to some people--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No more. Good night!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, good night.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Good night!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Well, good night, you two.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We haven't been here in a while.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know. I kind of want to break a few things. You've earned it, fucker.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I go and I knock on Grog's door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Grog doesn't have a door, Grog is currently staying in the war room area.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, that's right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as you head down, you see, curled up on the sand pit, this half-orc snoring loudly, like a golden retriever that had rotated twice and passed out in the sand. Grog, what are you doing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm like the dog that's staring at the cat that stole its fucking bed.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Can't argue with the dibs policy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's supreme. It's absolute. It's binding in all planes.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: All barbarians understand it. It's the law.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I stand next to him and stare at Chod-- Lionel in the sand pit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This is bullshit, right? Everything I had, everything I was, right there. Just another one.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Grog, I know that you probably feel replaced, but there's no way he could fill your shoes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, he's big! Look at those feet! It's like clown feet! I bet he's a great swimmer.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: He could-- I mean, but his feet are a little bit too big, you know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, too big.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Your feet are just right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right. Mm-hm.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I have an idea. How about we go get a bunch of blankets, the ones out of my room. We'll just make a fort by the fireplace. We'll make a better spot.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A new spot. Yeah, okay.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I just talked to Vex, and she said that maybe if something were to happen tomorrow, maybe it would be better to just say some things, so that you're not, you know, thinking about it if somebody dies.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is somebody dying tomorrow?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you going to die? Pike, you mean the world to me. Listen, I couldn't go on--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll be fine, I promise. Just, I guess, Scanlan.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Maybe, do you feel like you want to talk to him?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No! Yes. No!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I think I'm angry with him, but I can tell you're also angry with him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So I'll stay mad at him as long as you are.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: But I feel like maybe he feels a little bad.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you sure? I can't tell. He changed the inside of the mansion. He's got a new dog sleeping in the sandpit. He called him his best man. You heard it. I did.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That was weird.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. It's fucked up, is what it was.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, you know what we should do? We should just tomorrow--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Kill him.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's definitely an option, but I feel like maybe we could just try to be better than him. Maybe you could really show off, and show him that you are better, and that we're better, and we're better friends, and you know, that he should come back and hang out with us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah! No, I like this idea. This is really something we can roll with! Yeah! He should miss us! In fact, he should be coming to beg us to be like, I miss you! You're so cool!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: He should!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah! We've got to make him remember.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We've got to make him remember.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We've got to make him remember how great we are and what he's lost.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. So tomorrow, all the tricks out the bag, throw caution to the wind, you and me, it's a show.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: All the tricks.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: I suddenly wake up. You guys, I'm used to sleeping alone. You guys are talking so much.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, sorry, we didn't realize you were awake.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just roll over. If you pile the sand up, you make little earmuffs.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: It's not working, I'm used to silence, and you guys are like two alarms.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're going to go. We go make a blanket fort.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We make a blanket fort by the fireplace.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Thank you!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. As you guys go make a blanket fort, curl up and sleep takes you. The next morning, you come to consciousness, are greeted with a fantastic, spiritually brought, vegan breakfast.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, but like an acai bowl?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, sure. Yeah, that's a thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go, so it picks up the second day! There you go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is there granola?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It doesn't pick up. Don't defend this shit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Comparatively!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just because it's sweet doesn't mean that it's savory or satisfying.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fair enough.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: There's nothing sticking it together, so it's just loose.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's only the things that make granola good that make it not vegan.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Exactly. It's just all loose.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Any proteins that used to have a heartbeat, in any way? No? Yeah, fuck it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is a world of magic and delight!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's going to catch up when you burp really good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But we have a sound guy who's like--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But what if I want it to catch when I burp?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's what sound guys do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's how it works? Okay. So what's the plan, guys?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Stay in the mansion forever.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Let's take a look again.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I peek out the door?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Pike and I go to peek out the door, because we're not eating shit vegan breakfast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You peek out into the hallway, and there before you, you see about 20 or so armored skeletons that are all clustered into this hallway, maybe five feet between a few of them, but they're scattered throughout, they're just in this holding pattern.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What do you see?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: There's just 20 or so skeletons out there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This is the perfect opportunity!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: This is the perfect opportunity. Maybe we take care of it ourselves?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm saying! You lead the way!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Let's do it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, shit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I approve of this so hard.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, we're all still eating breakfast?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are eating breakfast, wondering where Pike and Grog are.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Before we break through the door, I should yell something like, Pike, don't be so brave!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, you can yell, Pike, don't be so brave, and then I can say something like, but Grog, you're too strong! I don't know, let me workshop it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Grog, you're too strong! You're too strong, you're just going to kill them all anyway.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This is true.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Should we just wing it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, just what happens.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, ready?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: On the count of what?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: On the count of three.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I can do that.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I know you can!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to get my mace ready.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have my blood axe.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Back at the breakfast table, just before they make whatever loud sound they're doing: It's good, it's almond milk, but I like cream a little bit (explosion).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep, suddenly you guys hear-- What do they hear?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: One.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Two. Three.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, that's it, yeah. Three!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Scanlan, because this is your mansion, you feel the door, suddenly, you sense the breaching of the front door opening.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, God. The door's open.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Grog, you're so strong!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, Pike, you're so brave!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, shit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You put yourself before others!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I take off running.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to start swinging my mace.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys all of a sudden drop your meals and start charging out. The door's already open, and it's vacant. You guys, as you charge out, all of a sudden you watch as ten of these creatures (zombie snarling) and leap towards you. What are you doing, Pike?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I just do this as I go through?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You'll still do attacks, but they'll get attacks on you as you go back and forth.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You rush forward. Go ahead and make your attack. Is it, as a war-- do you have two attacks? As a bonus action, you can attack, right?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah! I forgot, I haven't done this in a minute with undead! Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What does the Mace of Disruption do to undead?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Area of effect, y'all.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, no, it just hits targets. It's the other one does.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It says when you hit a fiend or undead with this magic weapon, the creature takes an extra 2d6 radiant damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So. Oh, okay. So 17 and 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17 and 22 both hit. Go ahead and roll damage for each, with the additional disruption damage.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, so, I don't have all of the dice out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: See, this is why you take the time at the beginning to organize.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know. Grog, while this is happening, you're also charging in with her and you're attacking?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, Great Weapon Master with the blood axe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make your two attacks with it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So with undead I also roll an additional 2d6, so am I doing four? How many?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You would do additional damage as part of your cleric's war--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, so 1d6, plus 2d8.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is the additional disruption damage?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Is just one strike. Sorry, I haven't done this in a while.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so as a war domain cleric, you can make a weapon attack as a bonus action, up to your wisdom modifier per day, so that's one use there. And you deal an additional 1d8 weapon damage on the attack, so it's-- How much damage does your mace do?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: 1d6 plus six and 2d8 is what I have written down.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: For Divine Strike.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: For Divine Strike.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct, yes. Yeah, because you reached 14th level. So yeah, it's plus 2d8. You got it. 1d6 plus 2d8 plus whatever the disruption damage is.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, so 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18 damage on the first hit? You slam the mace into the side of a skeleton, and it crushes a lot of the bone, and a lot of it just seems to erode away as the divine flash impacts it, and you watch as the bleached white turns to gray and black. However, it still stands, largely wrecked, but still (zombie snarling). And your second attack, you hit the same one?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, go ahead and roll damage for that one.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog, what are you doing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I did my first attack, it was a 26, and so was the second one, both with Great Weapon Master.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both hit with Great Weapon Master. Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The first one was 26 damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You completely destroy a skeleton in one hit. It turns into a scattering of bone (shatter) across the wall.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's what up.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Grog, it's so crazy how strong you are! They're all dying!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I know, but I only do it to protect my friends! And the second one is 39 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And with that second hit, a second skeleton that's leaping towards you, with a giant scimitar in the air and a buckler around the side of its wrist, (zombie snarling), you just batter-up swing it, and it explodes across and rains down upon you. Pike, a couple of the bones hit your armor, fall to the side.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With my bonus action, can I go into a rage and go, I kill these skeletons because I would never replace a friend like you!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I know, Grog!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, against Pike.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Quick, use your spells!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And a 20. What's your AC?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: My AC is 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two, miss. 20?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And 21?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Also hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike, what are you doing?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to Guiding Bolt down the hallway. Towards the rest of the skeletons.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Guiding Bolt can only hit one target.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh shit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, the area effects that you have are your Turn Undead or Destroy Undead, or any of the spells that you have.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Destroy Undead!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh yeah, Destroy Undead. Fuck, I forgot about-- Sorry, it's been a minute since I've been around them. Okay, yeah, Destroy Undead.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Come on, cleric.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you are--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's been a minute.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. You're a 17th level cleric now? 16th level? What level are you?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I think 16th level. I don't know if I've leveled.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, 16th level. So, CR 3 or lower. These are definitely there. All right. All righty. So, you're going to affect with that, in a radial area here, which is a radius of 30 feet. That's going to affect 15 of these undead.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nice!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Within the ones that are piled on you, that piled on Grog, and the ones that are swarming behind. What's your spell DC?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Rolled an 18, but it's a minus one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yay. Do you roll for all 15?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mm-hm.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Here he goes. Math. Still math.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, no, that one survived.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: More math.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't confuse him. It's a lot to keep track of. Hey guys, we have these amazing art prints by David Mack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Almost done.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh fuck, are they all making it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're held down by all of these skeletons, suddenly this beacon of divine, bright flame begins to burst from you. And you watch as the flaming wings of Sarenrae swirl up out of her like a phoenix. And as it does, you see above her the image of the dark skin, light flaming hair Sarenrae embodying her like a JoJo stand, as it takes this pose. And as soon as Pike brings her arms out and screams (yells), the image bursts out and you watch as every skeleton practically in that radius just turns to ash and dust in the vicinity, leaving two skeletons there, that are like (breathy groan). So there's maybe four of them left in the whole tunnel, from that one burst.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Damn!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I nudge Scanlan.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That was amazing.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do you think Scanlan saw?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, how could he miss it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm at the door.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (voice breaking) You and me against the world, huh?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You and me, Grog. We're so loyal to each other.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep, to the end. Best friends.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Best friends till the end.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog, what are you doing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm hitting things.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you rush up to the two.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I walk back to the kitchen and start clearing people's plates.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll step out into the fray just to watch.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A regular strike, 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ooh, and a 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, they all hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's as low as I can roll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17 is a low for you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I know. 16 points of damage on the first one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, first hit, it smacks into the side and breaks part of its upper shoulder and upper arm. It cuts off one of its arms, but it's still standing there in front of you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's embarrassing. I use the second strike on the same skeleton and hope Scanlan didn't notice.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck. 15 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This time you just cleave through the center of its spinal column and torso. It tumbles over and just scatters into a pile of bones.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. He saw it, didn't he? I fucked it up. He saw it and my whole plan's gone to shit.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So much is happening at once, he can't see, he didn't see.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan, you're at the door. You're at the door, Lionel. What are you guys doing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I sh-- I'm going to hold it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's three skeletons still standing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right, I'll shoot one of the skeletons.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it. Roll for attack. Lionel, what are you doing?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: I forget, you know--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: So I think it's now time to impress Grog a little bit, because he knows-- He goes into a rage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you go into a rage. Pull your great sword?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: My what? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you're charging out. What did you roll?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I just decided maybe I shouldn't hit them, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you go to fire and then pull the arrow back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Wait a second.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, it's the chicken-Scanlan incident all over again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So what happens is, you go and release it, and you just mis-strung it (sound of rope snapping), and you're like: Oh, I just didn't--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You know what? I'm going to leave it. It's for them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She's got the bruise on the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. So you rush up alongside Grog at the three skeletons that are there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I got a blood blister on my arm.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: I roll this?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, and you add the attack bonus of your great sword, which is right in the center.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Plus 12.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, natural 20!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, critical hit on the first hit?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Motherfucker.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so that hits. Roll the second attack.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's so strong.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't say that!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Another?! What?! What?!

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Another 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Did you roll two 20s in a row?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: He's raging, dude, and he's had a really great sleep in the sand.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've never seen anyone so strong and powerful before.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He doesn't even understand what just happened.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Are you getting turned on?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're honing Vin Diesel right now with this crit power.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Well, he's finally-- He likes these guys, he wants to finally show off and do something cool.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Travis just aged a year.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll 2d6.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Roll 4d6.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, roll 4d6.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Roll four of these.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Which ones? Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I think you get to reroll.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: I have to roll the two dice.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, there you go. Four of those.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And then you get to reroll any ones or twos.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh my god!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What? Are they all fucking sixes?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Is that a six?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a six.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Six, six, three, three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so 12, 18 plus?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Percy, take your hand off of him.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: No, he needs the help.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll damage for the second attack.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All four again.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm leaving. I'm going away.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: And I'm like: Grog, look at this, this is awesome! I think I'm channeling you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (strained voice) Yep. Real impressive.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You just, one skeleton, the other comes jumping at you and you just grab it in your hand and crush its skull in your hand.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (strained voice) That was real cool.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: With all the chalk and everything.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You've got to appreciate that, Travis.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That was really impressive.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percy. You want to do anything?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm just going to sit next to Vex and I think we're just going to stand and let this happen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So Pike, Grog, Lionel, you're right there, there's one skeleton left that's like (breathy hiss). And it leaps at you, since you just crushed its friend. And it hits you on your breastplate and just goes (metal ringing out sound) (breathy hiss). That's all it does. It's a sad sight.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Look, it's doing the Duck Flail to me. It's not as good, but that is what he's doing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, who wants to finish this poor thing?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Finish him, Grog, finish it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm broken on the inside. Did you see that display?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Grog, I need your help!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A one?!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A one?!! (laughter and yelling)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I War God's Bless it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A natural one is an auto fail. I cannot-- I cannot--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What is going on?! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you look at the one skeleton, just feeling this embarrassment, you swing with your axe and the skeleton (metal impact sound) stops it with its own blade and parries the axe to the side. The one that just didn't barely dent his armor.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Can I roll?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a nine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As he rolls, I will inspire him.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Nine plus 12, that's 21. 22!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to sing-- Oh well, that's fine, that's fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So that hits. Go ahead and roll damage. Just 2d6 plus seven. Well, plus your--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just two.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Oh, okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, that's not as good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, it's plus seven, plus your rage damage. So it's plus ten.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To this? 15.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, plus seven also.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus ten to whatever he rolled there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Five plus ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so 20 points. So as you hack down this other skeleton, you cut into it and it destroys part of its torso. Its arm that's holding its weapon is hanging to the side, but it's still standing. Its jaw is unhinged.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You get another shot, don't you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. So you attack again.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, attack again.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Four?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16 still hits. It's a skeleton. That's enough. You finish it off. You destroy the other skeleton in two hits.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: That was kind of a tough one, I get it. It's okay. That was a really hard skeleton. But he's dead now. Let's go--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We had it. We just-- We had it.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Can we eat these skeletons, because that breakfast is still blowing.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes you can. Give it a bite. Give it a bite.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Is there any meat left on those bones?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Chod, that was amazing. You slew those skeletons like they were nothing. Incredible.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: You guys are all awesome and I'm just glad I could be of service and help.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes. It's good to have someone like you by our side.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Awesome!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I walk back inside of the mansion.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I take out the giant cask of ale and I just...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just chug it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you drinking it or just pouring it all over you?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Both.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I come out with fresh coffee for Percy and Keyleth. What happened?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It was beautiful, terrible. I'm not entirely sure.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Chod saved the day. Chod saved the day.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, really, he cleaned up after you two finished it all off.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: He did. He did.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He swept up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was really good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You and Grog were most of the skeletons, easily.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we all back in the mansion?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're all back in the mansion, now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Why is it so tense in here all of a sudden?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think I know what's going on.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't know what happened.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pike, I've said awful things to you for as long as we've known each other, and I can't take them back, but I can at least try to be a better person. And can I confess something to you? During the last year, I've-- I think I've been praying. I mean, I just talk at night and nobody hears me, but I guess that's praying, right? And sometimes I talk to Sarenrae, because that's the only one I know. And she seems cool. And she seems like someone who could be a good guide. And it feels good. And I even wrote a little poem about her and about her teachings. It's very simple, but can I tell you it?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Let's hear.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "Everybody love, everybody know, how it go." I know it's stupid, but there's a certain Logic to it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Certain Logic to it. That actually makes a lot of sense.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It makes me feel connected to you guys, even though you're not there. So I say that to myself every night before I go to sleep.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It just makes you feel connected to Everybody people.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, stop.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can't apologize to you, because words don't work.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So, let me get this straight. You think you can go away for a year, and come back,

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (whispers) Ziggurat.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ziggurat. I don't even know why we're here. I thought maybe you'd come back and be like, oh my best mate, the guy that would do anything to keep me alive, there he is, I missed him. No. You come back, you've found yourself a brand new idiot. One that does amazing strikes, twice in a row. And talks to ducks. Has all sorts of new tricks, brand new model, new and improved in every way. I bet you do all sorts of fun things with him. So no. You do not get to apologize to me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But you're the best friend I ever had. And our times together were great, not because of our conversations, or our witty repartee. It was because of the fun we had together and the experiences we had. So last night, I wrote something for you. I know you can't read, but--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, Vex. He doesn't know that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I just got you a gift. Because if you won't spend time with me now, maybe you'll be able to spend time on your own. So I wrote you this. Maybe someone else can read it for him.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: He might be able to read it, Scanlan.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It depends on if there are long words.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's really long words.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's a big word. It's a bit--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, just give it a try.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Aoo, ooh, shh.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nope. Nope.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (whispering) I'm really embarrassed. I'm really embarrassed.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (whispering) I'll whisper it to you, then you say it out loud.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (clears throat) Yeah, I don't feel like showing off my powers. I can't read the dirty hand of betrayal.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: But it's fine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's Elvish.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a stupid name.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: AKA the Meat Man, AKA Vicoul the Vicious, AKA Reddish the Bold, AKA the Little Paws, AKA François Bertrand Jean-Luc Australia, be aware that the bearer of this note, Grog Strongjaw, shall be entitled to any libation of his choosing at any pub, tavern, restaurant, inn, alehouse, brewery, or house of lady favors within the city limits of Ank'Harel. He shall be allowed to drink until drunk, and enjoy no molestation by any employee of said establishment, unless he requests it. All charges and bills related to his drinking, cavorting, or violent behavior resulting from drunkenness, shall be forwarded to the Meat Man for timely payment in full. By complying with this request, you are hereby under the protection of the Meat Man, and shall receive all the benefits and goodwill accompanying such association. The Meat Man always remembers. Sincerely, Aes Adon.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Probably best to test it out. See if it's even worth anything.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Grog, I love you. I'm sorry that we won't get to hang out, because you hate me now. But I would never replace you. And if you ask me right now--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You'll kill him?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will kill him.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Who? (hushed laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (quietly) I wouldn't worry about it.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Okay. I really like this job.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (hushed laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Will you go drinking with me some time?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We'll see. By the way, I want you to know: when you died, I sang a song I would never sing for anyone else, and I'm sorry you didn't hear it, but it was really hard.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that true?

lines.name: LAURA, LIAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He sang?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Do a truthful check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you know what he sang?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A truthful check? Sure, I'll roll a truthful check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: An insight check? Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Honest as the day, or Grog dick is long, he apparently sang.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It is, I can just lean forward.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Happy 100th.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grog, I didn't hear it. Maybe you should sing it, and let him know what it was.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, you know, it's like the face of death in the hallway, once it uses up its power, it's done.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe that will remind you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're irreplaceable.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And he could've read this, by the way.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's incredible.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would've gotten the name right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, did you frame it like a coupon book? That's very impressive.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I had some time last night.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Coupons, that you can sort of pick out of it like a--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A free massage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like a couple on Valentine's Day. Who forgot it was Valentine's Day.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It looks like there's a free steak.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And until then, I'll just keep trying, and that's all I can do. And after this fight, if you want me to stay, and you guys go home, that's fine. But if not, maybe we can start over.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vex, Vax, Keyleth. At this moment, you hear what sounds like footsteps making their way up the tunnel. Not where the light was before, but the path you previously stepped from.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does it sound like skeletons, or heavier?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From just your passing hearing, it just sounds like patterned footsteps.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I cast Pass Without a Trace on everybody.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Everybody quiet down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're inside a glowing door, I think they know where we are.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, you guys all close the door to the mansion.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I don't want to close the door to the mansion, but turn out the lights in the mansion so you can't see.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No one's home! We're out of candy, no trick-or-treating.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They just pass and then continue going.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (whispering) You've seen that? You've seen that? Those are the guys?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: (whispering) Those are the guys.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (whispering) We should kill him. Let's go kill them.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (whispering) Can I murder one first?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (whispering) Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (whispering) Thank you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispering) Wait, I shoot--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're still inside the mansion.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I thought she said the door was just barely open.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, but they're not walking by; you made the door way back in the tunnel. You see them up toward the T-juncture. So you guys would have to leave the mansion and get there quickly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shit. We sneak out. We sneak out and shoot them from behind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, stealth check for those who are moving forward.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe we should all go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Now, wait a second.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If you feel like it, you can go. This is a team.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You Pass-Without-a-Traced us, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Those who are moving forward, stealth check?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Happy hundredth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anybody else moving forward with them?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm a little bit behind them. 28.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, are we all going?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Up to you guys. Whoever's going?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did everyone else leave?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If he's going, I'm going.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm behind you guys.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Twins are in the front.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, we're letting them go first.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Oh, I'm behind, but I'm going.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do have advantage on your stealth checks because of your boots, Pike.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Table right is hanging back behind the twins.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Plus ten?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, everyone got above 20.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Taryon's still asleep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You carefully move forward. The twins, you, at full stealthing pace, make it up to the corner, and as you crest around the side, about 20, 25 feet up, you see the two humanoid figures with hoods that come to a underoff point that hangs to one side. Looks like a leathery or rubbery substance from the little bit of light that's coming through, it's hard to really tell. They're wearing long black cloth, like a tunic, and what looks to be dark leather or thick black cloth, pants and boots.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pants and boots and pants.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Boots and pants and boots and pants. Not gloved hands, but they're both just carrying this chest along, they're just quietly moving along.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I bramble shot one of them.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (dagger throwing noise)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so, roll for your attack. On the one that's closest to you, or further?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: On the left.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, they're both moving away from you.

lines.name: LAURA, LIAM
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, you're further.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll go for the further one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should I roll two for attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, because they do not know you're there, so you have advantage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And this is assassinate, critical hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes it is, it's an auto crit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So, Oh! I'm an assassin too!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So I get an automatic?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So both you guys auto crit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sweet!! Ooh, so I double all my dice?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep, including the bramble shot.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit!

lines.name: TALIESIN
