lines.text: That's the end of both of them. It's going to be a cadaver and a fern.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, new chest. We could put our blankets in it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm working on a quilt.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was going to say, the quilt from your grandmother.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: This thing must be worth them dying for.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 66 on the first hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 66 damage?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: For the arrow, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 78 on the first hit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh wait, I didn't do my sneak attack damage! (cackling)

lines.name: JON
lines.text: They can just obliterate anything?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, they're monsters.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I rolled a 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll damage on that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 76 for the first hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. In an instant-- don't worry about the second attack, critical damage. Both of them just go-- (footsteps) (thud) (laughter)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What's in the box?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What's in the box?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You lift up the box--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We check it for traps.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, investigation check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's both check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What the fuck? You guys tonight. Talk about the hundredth episode mojo here. Unless you're Grog. Sorry, buddy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fucking leave it in the past!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, so. Who rolled investigation on that one?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He did.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What did you get?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20. Natural, oh that's right, (blows raspberry) I'm stupid. Yeah, no, it is not trapped, it's not locked, it's just closed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Spick and span.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It has a really rough texture on the outside.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We need to have Tary Identify it. Can we drag the box back to the mansion?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you drag it back (dragging noises). I mean, the box has some food and blankets that are meant to keep it hidden, so you search through as you find them. Those are the only things of interest in the box, the rest of it just seems to be to fill the space.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we hide the bodies?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. You guys drag the bodies back?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. And Dust of Tracelessness to hide where they were dragged.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to take their cloaks.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You want me to hide the bodies?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. The opening is about that big, so it takes you a second, just like when you had to put Dork the Ox in there, it's like trying to fit a king-sized pillow in a twin-sized pillowcase.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I fully support it. Whatever you need to do to feel better, man.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm trying to get over these double ones, man, I'm working it out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm curious about a couple things here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't touch any of it, until we get Tary to look at it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: While they drag the bodies back, Percy and I take the robes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to strip the cult members of their culty pants.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, Percival and Keyleth are currently wearing--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I study one of the guys' face, and take that for Alter Self?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure, easy enough. You also find that both of them have what looks like a dark iron symbol hanging around their neck, hidden beneath their robes. It resembles a four-pronged pitchfork that has a single rod beneath it that forms a loop.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you have a picture?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm going to sketch it for you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What was it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 22, tied with Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, mine's just 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Percy and Scanlan are tied.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan. Okay. All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, does Doty roll? I forget. No, he just goes when Taryon does.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, I'm letting him go with Taryon. It's easier to check that. All right, 20 to 15?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Taryon's 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so we have Grog. You got, what did you say? 17? Vax, what did you say?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, 15 and you said 17 for Taryon?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 16 for Taryon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What did you get?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He got 17. Did he tell you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, he didn't tell me that. Sorry about that.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. So many things on the board. I wonder if those statues are going to come to life.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. So who else is left. Pike?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Seven! She's so good at initiative rolling.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so at the beginning of this initiation, with the orb now flaring this pale gray-white and Delilah Briarwood standing there at the top of the ziggurat, staring down and focusing on the group of intruders that have just rushed in. Keyleth, it's your turn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh god. Okay. I am going to, under the cult hood that I have, transform my face with Alter Self into Sylas Briarwood.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Her husband. Her dead husband. I'm going to have his face, and I'm going to walk forward and say, Delilah. Don't. It is me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a deception check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Deception?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as you step forward into the chamber.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is not good.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sunshine, roll high.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm not good at this shit. Oh, that's not bad! 14? That's it. 14. That's all I got. 14 is good for me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's dark.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so that's your action. As you say this to Delilah, her eyes flash over to you, and her face goes--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's mad.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So pissed!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have your movement and your bonus, still.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Movement and a bonus? (sighs)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Feeblemind on the dragon.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I am going to take my bonus to ignite my form into a fire elemental and rush towards the closest thing to me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're turning into a fire elemental.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. I don't know. Where are we?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go, Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I have a 50-foot movement. I want to hit as many skeletons as I can by running through them and catching them on fire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do get attacks of opportunity on you as you rush by. That is 15?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What am I against?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's your AC for your fire elemental?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so that's 11 points of slashing damage, reduced to half because you take half damage, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yep. So five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a 13?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Miss. No, hit. Armor class is 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Miss.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eight.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Miss.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. That one and that one. That is a 15 from the minotaur skeleton.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take 17 points of slashing damage, reduced to eight. And the last one is a natural 20, so you take 22 points of slashing damage, reduced to 11. And they are all set aflame. All of them take, I believe, fire damage from impacting you?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So we'll say eight damage across the board for all of them. All of them get hit with fire as they swipe out at you, including the giant minotaur that swings over you with this large greataxe in its hands and bursts into flames as it does so. Awesome. All right, that ends your turn, Keyleth. Delilah, who's currently glaring at Keyleth and the rest of you, looks out and goes, "Of course it would be you, wouldn't it?" She takes a step back. Without breaking eye contact, goes, "Finish your work." (foreign words) And slams her hand down on the ground, and you watch as this sphere of rainbow color completely encompasses around the top of the ziggurat. You now see this large orb, this dome of multicolored rainbows that flickers for a second, and then briefly becomes a singular color.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a giant--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see it is a giant Prismatic Sphere around. The color you see now as it flickers for a minute becomes stark red, just deep ruby red.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: It's so pretty. Look at it, you guys.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Taste the rainbow.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: These people kill ducks, Lionel.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: (gasps) Kill them all!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percival, Scanlan. What are you guys doing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Scanlan, you first. My plan just went up the rainbow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. I'll step forward and I will-- is Vax or Vex near me? Vex is near me, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vex is near you, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Something creepy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Working your way back up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And then I'll cast Reverse Gravity on everybody. Everybody in there. All their shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty! What's the radius on that? My templates are still back on the shelf. Can someone grab my templates real fast? That would be awesome.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 50 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 50-foot radius?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 50 feet radius.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, that's going to get everybody in there, including probably Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can take it. I'm into this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can fly, though, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can fire hover?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have sticky feet right now, so I ain't going nowhere.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the spell DC with the hand cone?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fuck their shit up!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does it affect people in the dome?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll hear a thunk, won't we?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see over here, a number of other robed figures and one that looks like it's heavily armored in the front, as well. A couple of small other cultists down on the sides, but they all-- apparently. Okay, the armored one actually manages to grab the stonework and hold on.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh boy, Matt's hating this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everyone else, except for that one armored guard, rises up and (wham) slams into the ceiling 50 feet up. That is 5d10 points of damage. 5d6, sorry. Thank you very much. Perfect.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is that including me, or no?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That would be including you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let me just reiterate, we always appreciated Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I just need to hear it more, guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20 points of bludgeoning damage, which completely destroys these skeletons that were damaged earlier from the fire.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So long, pawns.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Are you maintaining it, or letting them fall?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maintain!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, so everyone else is held in the air right now against the ceiling.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The people inside the dome? No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seem to be unaffected.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, that ziggurat.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Anti-magic dome.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll move a little closer in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So over here next to Pike?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Done. Percival.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends Scanlan's turn. Percy, what are you doing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Actually, let's pull out Animus. This will be funnier if I'm walking around that way, which is always a fun thing to say. There's that one guy holding on, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's one guy holding on, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's one guy holding on. I'm going to use my gun to make him drop an object of my choosing. And that object is going to be the pyramid. So just remembering how to do this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll for an attack.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Roll for an attack. That's 29?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That will hit. All right, he has to make a strength saving throw?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Strength saving throw against 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope, five plus five. That is a no, so he goes (whoosh) and slams into the ceiling, as well, taking-- ooh, that is 22 points of bludgeoning damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can Keyleth clothesline him on the way up as a fire elemental?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. Close enough. You swoosh over there; it's fine. More of a flavor element. So all the visible creatures you can see right now are held against the ceiling.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, is he still alive? I don't suppose I have advantage to hit anything that's pinned to the ceiling.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm going to say for the purposes of falling up, a lot of them are prone, so you would actually have disadvantage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So weird. I'll take it. I hit the wrong thing. There we are. I'll burn another point for advantage and shoot him again. Just with a straight roll. That's 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits. Same armored guy?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Same guy. That's nine points of damage, plus three points of psychic damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. All right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I'll hit him again. Same thing. Hit him again. This time I'm going to take a bonus for a Hex on him, too, for extra fun. That's 27.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So that's not bad. That's 17 points of damage, plus three points of psychic damage and five points of necrotic damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The one shot sends it flying up into the ceiling, and I'd say even before it impacts, as it's still floating up in the air, you shoot it once while it's still falling upward, and then it slams into the ceiling and you get one final shot to hit it while it's there. (grunts) Across the top. It's hard to see if it's really that hurt, but it's currently a little wounded.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, and he's got disadvantage on dexterity checks for now, because that's funny.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you going to move, Percival, or are you going to stay where you are?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm slowly going to make my way towards the ziggurat, so I'm going to be actually walking up on the wall. So you can put me up on the little creases. Yeah, I'm walking sideways, as gravity's reversed right now. I'll make my way, as far as I can get, towards the sphere.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Those two are going to continue their work. You don't see what's in there. Grog, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is it me and Chad?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They actually can take an action this turn from that distance. So I need Grog and Pike to both make wisdom saving throws.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you both wise?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I have gnome cunning, so I have advantage on wisdom.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What did you say it was, wisdom? 20?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Roll your advantage. You get advantage.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Maybe I don't need it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Try it. Maybe you'll roll a natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Advantage for which one?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I have gnome cunning. I have advantage on wisdom, intelligence, charisma saving throws.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just in general?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I guess so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Against magic, I think it was? So yeah, both of you guys shrug off the effect. You feel the magic try to take hold over the inside of your brain and your muscles seize up and you manage to shrug it off. It's a familiar feeling. It is one that you're familiar with, as well, Pike. It is a Hold Person attempt on both of you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I know what you did. I know what you were trying to do!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that ends their turn. Grog, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, where does that sphere of vertical influence start?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not entirely certain, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Awesome. I'm going to go into a rage and haul ass along this wall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, as you rush into this wall here, I need you to make a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have advantage on those. 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog, you start running and then (yelps) go flying up into the ceiling.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh shit, it affects the area?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (screams)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take 17 points of bludgeoning.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I raged at the beginning.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So half that. You're now locked on the ceiling, as well. However, that does put you in melee range, and prone, with one of the cultists on the ceiling.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Totally meant to do that. I'll attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're upside-down on the ceiling. The guy who cast a spell and it didn't work on you watched you tumble up, land, get up, and stare him down in his face.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hi.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: His hood falls off. You see a guy who's staring at you now with one eye plucked out of its socket.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll some damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So I rolled a ten. Two more of these, seven. 31, 11, 42.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You smile at him, bring the axe back, and you completely-- we're talking tree trunk. He slides over and his body attaches to the ceiling and collapses against that, blood splattering out from his midsection. It seems really gross, in a sense. You still have at half movement, about 20 feet to run across.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I'll keep trying to come to this wall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This wall? Okay. That's about as far as you get, but you don't have range with your axe.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Finishes Grog's turn. Lionel. You're over here, currently.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: I move forward and I jump into the radius so I can float up, too. And as I'm flying, I say, I'll save you, Grog!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Come on, buddy!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you go into a rage first? It will reduce your impact damage as you land.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Wait, what?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You take less damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you want to be raging first, you'll take less damage from the impact.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Yeah, you know what? Let's rage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You joyfully leap into the sky.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: It's the duck rage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take 16, reduced to half, so you take eight points of bludgeoning damage as you slam into the ground at the top, and you stand up and there's about five feet between you and Grog, and one of the cultists is there right in front of you, who's like, "Shit!"

lines.name: JON
lines.text: I rage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you want to attack him? Go for it.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Three, plus 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Three plus 12 still hits, actually.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: He does it clumsily.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your first strike is 2d6 plus ten damage.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Seven. 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17 points of slashing damage as you pull your greataxe up and rake past. You see his chest split open and he (grunts) pulls back. He's still alive, and as he looks up at you from under the hood, he is also missing one of his eyes. (pants)

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Second attack? Rage, bonus action...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have an extra attack as a barbarian, so you get a second attack.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Do the same thing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Natural 20! Now roll 4d6.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll 4d6.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Stop touching him!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Whoa! Does he get to reroll ones?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, that's a one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does he get to reroll a one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He does, because of his great weapon fighting, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Reroll it. Better.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: So it's 17. Plus ten. 27.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. The first strike cuts him across the chest. (pants) Rears back. Oh, that wasn't enough, and with a second half-assed swipe, he goes down and spills out all across the ceiling. That cultist is done. All righty, that finishes your turn. Taryon.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm on a broom!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's hard to keep track of three characters.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, Matt does it all the time.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The walls are tall enough that you can put that above people and it won't be a problem.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Possibly. We'll find out. Where are you going, Tary?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to fly straight in to the steps.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you're doing a dash? Or just your movement?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I get there in one fly?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the speed of the broom?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's 40, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can get there. That's as close as you can get with one movement.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're close, though. You can throw something at it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can't get all the way there, so I'll cast something. Shit. It's a prismatic thing, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right now you have this ruby, bright-red dome that's glowing with light right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Would a Prismatic Spray beat a Prismatic Spray? Probably not, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't know. What do you think?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there anyone right above me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, actually. These guys here are on the ceiling right now. Anything you see there are on the ceiling, currently.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And I'm up a bit, so I could throw something at them? I guess drop it. I'll drop a thing of fire up there. Alchemic fire. A little pot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which one?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I get two of them? It has a five-foot radius.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you can hit these two.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Great. I'll go for both of them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: what's the DC?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Skeleton does not. So the cultist dodges out of the way on the ceiling. It smashes on the ground by the skeleton and bursts into flames. How much damage does it deal to the skeleton?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm 15th level or 16th level?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15th.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. 5d6.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 5d6 fire damage to the skeleton.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16 points of fire damage? That skeleton, fire consumes it. It's still currently standing, and now the flames are licking through its ribcage. That ends your turn?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will, as a bonus action, cast Sanctuary. Am I within 30 feet of any of my friends?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right now? Nope.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: On myself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. Vax, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Boots on, poof go the wings. I have two actions left. It's really hard to see. How far am I from skeletal minotaur?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And nowhere on the board are any of my allies within melee combat range of any enemy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope! Anyone that was killed whatever they were fighting.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's what I figured. Okay, so I'm going to use my two remaining actions to throw daggers at minotaur skeleton.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From where you are? From where you're standing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm 40 feet away. I'm in range.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, and you have sharpshooter.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I didn't say it on the first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have sharpshooter, right? Sharpshooter feat.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have it if I choose it, but I don't want to choose it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, I'm asking because that ignores cover.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have sharpshooter. Right, so I ignore three-quarters cover. So the first one is a 19?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Good, and the second one-- oh, that hits, for sure. That's a 16... 28. Okay, so for the first one, I'm going to unload some Smite into this motherfucker because I know he's undead. That is three, plus eight is 11, plus psychic damage is 17, plus 3d8 because he's undead. So 17 plus eight is 25, 29, 36 for the first attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 36 damage. As you fling the dagger out, it seems to skid across the stone of the pillar in front of it, leaving these bright white sparks as it hits. Comes through and strikes through the chest. As it does, a burst of divine energy. You watch as some of the ribs shatter and scatter across the stonework. (roars)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fucking feathers, buddy. And then the second one is four, plus the Smite, and I get four plus eight is 12, 15, 22.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait, I can only smite once per round?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can smite. I believe so. I think it's whenever you expend a spell slot, so I don't think there's a limitation per round. That's part of what makes paladins so crazy at the higher levels, actually. But just to make sure of that or the internet's going to hate me. No, there's no limitation on that. So 22?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm also going to use my movement. Is there enough room to fly safely over big skeleton?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's about 12 feet tall, so as long as you get 20 feet over it, you can.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Then I want to get into the back corner closest to Liam, on the map.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Over here?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. 120 feet of movement.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Over here, you mean.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you're over here in this area.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's good. Done.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that ends your turn. Vex.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Has anybody tried shooting anything through the orb?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not yet, no.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Well, I'm going to try Hunter's Marking Delilah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have no sight on her.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't?

lines.text: And my bonus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is that your turn?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, that's it. That's all I've got. I can't see the danger I'm in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's true. However, you didn't take any damage, so you didn't lose your concentration on the spell. You're just blinded. All right, so now those cultists have all been slain. I forgot to do the skeletons last time, so I'll have them move in. These two skeletons are going to rush in. This one's going to go ahead and... 25. That's four skeletons on you, Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Four skeletons on me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Eight misses you. 13 misses you, I'm pretty sure. Eight again.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Miss!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to charge in towards the pedestal. What's the first thing that I reach?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The first thing that you reach over here is a skeleton.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Reckless, great weapon master.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits. Minimum damage, you destroy it, because of the great weapon master. You walk up, smash. There's one also adjacent to you there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep. Him, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Reckless again. 20, even.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20 hits. Minimum damage shatters that skeleton. You can move five feet in and get a third one, if you'd like.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Actually, I would like to smash the Titanstone Knuckles together and cast Enlarge on myself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So instead, you go into full, large-size Grog mode here. (impact sound) There you have it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fee fie foe, you're fucked.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's your turn, Grog? Lionel.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Okay. Who's the closest to me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Closest to you are the skeletons here, or if you wanted to rush around and get the guy with the big heavy armor.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: That's the old guy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's an old one with a staff, there's a black knight in all the armor with the halberd, or there's some skeletons.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Can I make it over to the black knight?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you can make it over to him.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get up to him right there.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Is there any of my teammates? I want to give bardic inspiration to someone. Are you close? You need it? I'm going to give you--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're upside-down on the ceiling.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm like, you know how to spell, Lionel!

lines.name: JON
lines.text: That's the only thing I learned.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm so impressed.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: It's the only song I know, but it works.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How much do I get?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take a d8, I think?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: 1d8 times three per short rest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you can use it three times. You get a d8 inspiration die, Keyleth.

lines.name: LIAM, MARISHA
lines.text: Be aggressive.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: I'm going to do a Hold Person. I want to hold that guy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. He's going to make a wisdom saving throw. What's your spell DC?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16. Natural 20.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: So it doesn't work.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. As you begin to cast the spell on him and you reach out for his mind to clench it, he (chuckles) and readies his halberd. No effect.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Okay. Don't I have another attack? Is raging done with now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're still raging. You can maintain your rage as long as you're attacking things. You used your action to cast the spell instead of attacking.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: So my turn is done.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sorry, man. All righty, Taryon.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't think I can get through that thing, can I? I'll fly up closer to the orb.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We still have two cultists full of magic.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. Where are they?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They're above you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They're right above me?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: On the roof.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. Well, then I'll attack them, I guess. How wide is my Prismatic Spray cone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How wide is your Prismatic Spray cone? What's the cone size on it that it says?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's just the standard Prismatic Spray spell.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a sugar cone, not a waffle cone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Will it hit the protective thing, as well as the people on the ceiling?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can aim it up probably to catch the edge of it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm mainly aiming at the two dudes above.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you can hit those guys and the blackguard, if you want to. All righty, so roll a d8.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A d8? Just 1d8?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For that guy there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, that's right, to pick the color. Four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For the sphere?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seven for the sphere. That is violet. No effect. Okay, that guy there?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two. Orange. Acid. And the guard.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Five. Cold. All right, so roll 10d6. Failure for him. Failure for the blackguard, who rolled a four. All three of them fail.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. (counting) 39.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to end yours?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, pretty much. Oh, and I'll fly closer to the sphere. I said that already.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Vax.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, I'm up? Lionel is right on that dark paladin, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is correct.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. I would like to use my movement to fly. It's probably not all of it, but 120 feet to get to his backside and stab him in the back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can get there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We'll start with that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You rush in.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is a 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19 will hit, yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So that guy took 45 in the back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, and as you rush down with the speed of an elven bullet, you drive the blade right into the center of the armor plates, and you watch as he's chuckling with his glaive out, glaring at Lionel. (chuckles, death rattle, thud) And falls dead to the ground.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Perfect. So that's movement, action, and what I have left is hasted action and bonus action, so I would like to use my bonus action to zip over to Pike, 120 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As a dash. Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, and use my hasted action to carry her out of here, out where there's nobody. Towards the end of your map.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, grabbing her, you can move at half movement to try and pull her along.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's 60 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. You get her about over here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your turn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I give her a bonus-bonus action to tousle her hair. Next.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vex.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to take aim at the other cultist. I'm going to Hunter's Mark them. That's the old one with the staff?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are two of them that appear to be staff wielders. The older one has been destroyed with acid. The other one you haven't really gotten close enough to see the face of.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But they're holding a staff?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I'm going to bramble shot the one that I haven't seen his face yet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so roll to attack.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was a 33.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that will hit. Roll damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. (counting) Nobody's standing next to him, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (counting) 27. So 27 damage, and then DC of 17. Strength DC of 17.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're a fucking beast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Does not succeed. He is restrained. (grunts) As you slam with the arrow from the other side, (grunts) the vines curl up and wrap around, constraining him. He's still holding the staff through part of it, but he's completely unable to move and is restrained.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But he's holding the staff, still?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to hit him again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: TRAVIS, ASHLEY
lines.text: Get him!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can't fucking add! 22?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22 does hit. Roll damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 100th episode, guys.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's extravagant.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're onto our bonus material.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know. I want to finish this to a narrative beat. Sorry. Thanks for coming along, guys.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do I get sneak attack because he's restrained?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Advantage, yeah. Yeah, motherfucker.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was the shittiest additional four. Oh no. I don't have any idea what I rolled before that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then roll again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 33. Got it. All right, so (arrow impact) the other arrow hits. Blood pours out of the mouth as they're being held there. They're trying to break away, but they're not very strong. End of your turn? Trinket?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to get on my broom.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you get on your broom. You going to move anywhere?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, but I'm going to be ready to.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (motorcycle revving)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, so the necromancer that you just hit--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I Hunter's Marked him, too, didn't I? I didn't add my Hunter's Mark on either of those attacks. An additional seven for Hunter's Mark.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. All righty. He angrily, from beneath the vines, gets his staff forward and begins chanting something under his breath. Rears back and exhales, and you watch as a cloud of green, billowing, poisonous smoke spills out in this area. That's going to get all of you guys. I want Keyleth, Grog, Lionel, and Percy to all make a constitution saving throw, please.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is it magical?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is magical. It is a Cloudkill spell.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's not poison, though, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is poison.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't fuck me, Gil. Ooh, that's not great. I'm going to go ahead and roll my inspiration. That's better.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you take--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have resistance against poison because of the Belt of Dwarvenkind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 points of poison damage, reduced to seven.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12. You suffer 30 points of poison damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm okay. I'm all right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Lionel?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How much? 31?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 30 points of poison damage.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: 18, but how does off a duck's back work, again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You use your reaction to reduce the damage by half.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Do I have a reaction? Can I do that now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, and you succeed on that, so you actually reduce it to a quarter, so instead it is seven points of poison damage. Percival?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I rolled 27.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 points of poison damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Off a duck's back? Oh mallard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The cloud remains in this area, so this whole area is a billowing cloud of bad news.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I assume we didn't hear that terrible pun from inside the orb of death?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: What was it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I said, oh mal-lard. Oh mallard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, I understand it happens at the start of their turn, but we're trying to get through this quickly, guys. Don't worry. Calming down the internet. It's fine. Yep. Two skeletons already went. That brings us to Pike.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I do anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can move and attack. No spells.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She can attack. Oh, she can't attack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But we're way in the back.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can't do anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not much you can do from this angle, unfortunately. What do you want to do?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: There's no rolling against it or anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope. You get to roll against it in 30 days.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, cool. I'll be back in New York.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We'll time-jump.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can fix it. Just give me a hot second.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if you die?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, what if you die?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We'll have several problems if Keyleth dies.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Just wander off? I'll start walking back towards that way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This way?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Just start wandering. Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can dash again.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't need to dash.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Who's left on the ceiling with me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's you and Grog and Lionel on the ceiling with two skeletons.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Two skeletons? That's it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And one cultist.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And one fucking cultist?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: He's been pretty hard to kill.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can't help.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god. A lot of things have changed in a hot second. Okay. What's going on right now?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can't help. I'm not allowed to help.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where's Delilah?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's hiding in the ball. We can't get to her.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Smoke everybody outside that bitch.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to go red dragon?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And that's all I can do, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. That is your action.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm a dragon on the ceiling.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can still move if you want to, but you are a dragon on the ceiling.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Cool.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you have a giant crate of the things she can turn into?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He does. He had to pack a lot of stuff because of me. I feel mildly guilty.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's fine. What are you doing, Keyleth?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I move, (impacts) giant dragon walking on the ceiling, and then look down at Delilah backwards and upside down and say, hello!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get two attacks of opportunity from the two skeletons as you step over. 18 and 21.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Take 11 points of slashing damage. Do you have damage resistance in your dragon form?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You move over and you look down. It's an orb, it's not a cylinder, so you just see the giant red dome. You can't see her because it's a dome.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can't see her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For the purposes of this, you are currently right there and it's just a big red dome. There, it's fine. Reverse Gravity makes this battlefield so easy to keep track of.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sorry, Matt!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's fine. All right, Keyleth, is that your go? It was an action to cast it and your move.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have Frightful Presence for anyone who might be terrified of me. That's it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a 21 wisdom.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's that against?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The DC of whatever your Frightful Presence is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 19. Versus wisdom save.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wisdom saves, yeah, she makes it. She looks out, seeing everyone falling apart out there, pulls back in, looks at Scanlan and goes, "There's more important things to do." She grabs her amulet that she has around her neck and as she holds it again, you watch as the white orb that was glowing turns to black once again. In that instant, Grog, you revert back to your regular size, Keyleth, you return to your form, Percy, you fall off the side of the wall and land on your feet barely. The skeletons just collapse into piles of bones. Tary, you fall and land on the ground there. This Prismatic Wall vanishes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does Feeblemind end?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Feeblemind, currently, right now, is not affecting you. Meaning, Feeblemind, whatever the spell is right now, doesn't seem to be having an effect. All of a sudden, your consciousness comes back to you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Really?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Uh-huh.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, fucking hell!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She, clutching the amulet, gives a nod to the two other cultists and all three of them step into the black orb. You watch as their forms (whooshing noises) and vanish.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They disapparated.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: They stepped into the circle?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The orb, they went into the orb!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They're moving freely and it looked like pretty familiarly--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Through the sphere.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They went into the thing! They're gone forever!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And they've done it before.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's how they got over here!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan, I want you to roll a perception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not great. Five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Never mind.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If she went in the tiny thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I still have Shapechange for another hour.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, it's gone, you're done.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, did she cancel my spell, or is it just the orb that's done?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You sense the concentration is still there, but the spell has no effect where you currently are. By the way, Lionel and Grog, you both (falling sounds) slamming into the ground.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Dexterity?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope! You guys suffer 15 points of bludgeoning damage. So, reduced to half for both of you because you're raging, so seven bludgeoning damage each.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And are the wings schlorped back in?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. Your wings (retracting sound).

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Mine says "while raging, resist bludgeoning damage."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take seven, as opposed to 15.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Am I still there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're still there, right next to the orb.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am going to unload a couple shots into the orb and see what happens.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go ahead and take a shot.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I pull Retort. That hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically, fire, discard, quick draw, right? Quick draw means you can do it as a free action as a part of it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I'll burn an action surge for this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll say because you only used your bonus action to-- oh, not to reload. As a quick draw, you can pull it as an attack, you're fine. So, you do three attacks, the third one fires. You fire (bullet) and it vanishes into the orb.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to sit and fix my guns.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are there any enemies left on the map?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Currently, there's the one right there who's being held by the brambles. The brambles have vanished, and he's currently still conscious, and it's not his turn yet. So, Percy took all the shots into the orb. It is now Scanlan's turn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will draw my blade and scream and hit that thing with my sword. No, the guy! The guy, not the orb.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You rush towards the guy as the brambles wither away and fall to the ground. He turns around to rush towards the orb just as you rush towards him. Your bardic battle cry just "Argh!" with Mythcarver. Go ahead and make your attack.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Somewhere.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That'll hit. His armor class isn't very high; it's just a mage armor of 15.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yay!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shit, I can't find anything, I think it's 1d8 plus two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's 1d8 plus your strength.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 1d8 plus three. Right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's your strength modifier?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can't even find it. I think it's one, but this is an old sheet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, 1d8 plus one, your strength hasn't gone up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you. Seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seven damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Plus one. So eight damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eight damage. How do you want to do this, Scanlan?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The most lackluster how do you want to do this!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He had, like, three hit points left. How do you want to do this?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll just stab him in his toes over and over and I'll say, this is what you get for separating me from my friends! Who I want to be around forever because I love them! Is this what we're supposed to do now, is this the thing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't question it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Yeah, my friends!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you repeatedly stab it in the feet, he's like, "Ow! Ow! Ow! Ow! Ow!" and it's like trying to pull away from you down the side of the pyramid ziggurat. "What are you doing?!" as you keep stabbing it over and over again into the feet until it falls unconscious. Bleeding out through his ankles. How very Scanlan.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Through his ankles.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughing) That is the stupidest death!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right, we're going in the little sphere. Here we go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So, what? What?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, no, no.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So it's only a dark magical, anti-magical field because she

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She manipulated it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She turned it into that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Which means--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She succeeded on the previous one. This a pathway into some other world now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She can change it!

lines.name: JON
lines.text: She did something. It was black before, then she turned it white, and I don't know if that allowed magic. But when she turned it black again, all magic stops, so.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Which is like the one that we've been around.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, she knows what she's doing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who has Speak with Dead?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can't do anything in here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to drag this cadaver outside.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, let's take the cadaver outside.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So, it's just very strong magic which makes her change what it is?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She knows how it works. We don't know why she's here, but she figured shit out the last time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We fucking killed her. How did we kill her before? How did she die?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You killed her in the hallway as she was trying to escape back to Castle Whitestone when you were fighting Orthax.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like, she fully fucking died.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You killed her and threw her body in the acid pit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Holy shit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not a lot of remains to be, you know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Resurrected.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All of their magic was necromantic.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What if it's just her soul or something?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if it's not really her?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, listen, we're not going in the orb, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, so let's drag one of these smart-looking fucks outside and have Pike do Twenty Questions.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm a little worried that once we walk outside, Pike becomes dumb again.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, she can Greater Restoration her as soon as we walk outside.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's take this outside. Just take it outside. Nothing good happens here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, before we go. Pike, does Sarenrae know anything about this? Anything?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I can check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sam, I think you're right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're just going to waste your attempt in here.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: There might be some ducks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you going to try to have a brief communion with Sarenrae in the temple?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, you could try.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If you lose your brain, you can't do it, so why not?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll try.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You drop to your knees for a moment and concentrate, hoping for her wisdom. Go ahead and make a general wisdom check. Roll a d20 and add your wisdom modifier. Plus five.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wisdom modifier?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, I believe it's plus five.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This needs to stop. Only terror will come through this."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We have to go there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Whatever way you can. Our reach cannot go beyond the Divine Gate."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: If I go there, will you not be able to go with me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I will be diminished, if at all able to."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And her finger touches your head and she kisses the top of your forehead and you feel the warm presence again, and she withdraws. As she withdraws, the cold is even harder with her absence because now the proximity of that shadow, of this room, just this general sense of negative energy and death that emanates from this direction behind you. As soon as you watch her light vanish and you open your eyes again, you're chilled to the bone.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Well, it's a doorway, and we have to go there. It's the only way to stop this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Stop what?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, we can't go through now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can't we?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it just like this now? Like the ziggurat in Whitestone?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know. Can't we?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we can.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, fuck. But, we're not even healed. They just went through. We're going to go through and just die immediately.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If we go through and Pike's dumb--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Maybe we should back out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The last time I put my hand in the sphere when it was black it nearly tore me apart. We could try again.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It was just a doorway?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It was a doorway, and it opened into a city of sorts and in the middle was an obsidian tower.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's what I saw through the other one!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do I feel anything? Sense anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In what way?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: From my patron.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you wish to try to concentrate there?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a wisdom check. d20, add your wisdom modifier.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's shit. Seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You try and reach out to her, but nothing is returning your call.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, let's step out of the range, see what happens.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we back out and see how far the range goes? Is it the same distance as our ziggurat?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, you drag a body, you said?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, one of the bodies.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Which one, the dark paladin?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, that asshole.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, you take the black guard, drag it behind you. The rest of you all continue down the pathway. You get to about where that T-intersection was and Pike, your brain goes numb once more.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (laughing) No!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Keyleth goes over to Pike and puts her palm on her head and casts Greater Restoration.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The spell immediately loses its hold and you regain control of your facilities.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Disaster averted, Keyleth. I throw my arms around her and I kiss her on the forehead, on the cheek.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just full on her lips.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Sorry, I'm just so intense.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I've learned it from you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, do we need to talk to this dead person?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What? We don't need to talk to this dead person?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry, I was answering a different question. Continue.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll cast Speak with Dead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Speak with Dead. You watch the plate armor rouse ever so slightly as the fresh corpse begins to clink and tense against the metal plates. You hear the creaking sound of breath trying to escape from the reedy thin slit where, apparently, part of the dagger blow that you had shoved in the back of its neck went through and cut part of the vocal cards.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Eww! Fucking gross!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have its attention.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Is this one of the ones where his eye is missing, is he one of those guys?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you glance closer to the black guard, because the helmet's still on, you'd have to pull the helmet off.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: He's the guy with the-- yeah. Pull it off for sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pull the helmet off-- it's missing its eye.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: By the way, while this is going on, I'm dragging Doty out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. (creaking)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I help. Trinket helps, too, because he's stronger.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, what do we want to know?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Five questions.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Why an eye is missing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How they access the gate.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What is it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You've got five?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Five.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is the gate safe for us to travel?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Who do you work for? Okay. Is it safe for any of us to get through the gate?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (gasping) Through the jaw doesn't move, you hear the escaping thin air forming words that say, "You need one of the crafted stones to pass unharmed."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or the blade, the sphere!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (gasping) "Or be hearty enough to survive its ravishing doorway."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Who do you serve?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We are the Remnants. Small parts of the whole, given purpose to come together and remake "the vessel of the Undying King."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Why do you have one eye missing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "To bequeath ourselves of the highest Remnant order to the Whispered One is to gift our "sight like he did. Be granted knowledge he keeps."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's only two more questions left.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Suggestion. How did Ripley return--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not Ripley. Delilah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's what I meant to say. Delilah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Was that Delilah?

lines.name: LAURA, LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How did Delilah return?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I have one job!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's stupid!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: How did Delilah return?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I know not the means. But she is a powerful necromancer, and with the right preparation, even "death can be averted."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What did you say?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or, do they have plans to attack through the orbs? Or how many orbs are there on this plane?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So he might not know the answer.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, are there plans to come through the orbs?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, that's a great one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is there anything that Delilah is afraid of?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nah, he wouldn't know that.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What are your plans? What are The Remnants' plans?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (chuckling) "His return is nigh. The Whispered One "will come. His acolytes will help him complete his destiny through the Ritual of Seeding. From within "the gate he will rise, the solitary tyrant and lord of Exandria. And with the sole crown of "creation guarded upon his head, we who were his body will be rewarded with life eternal at his side." (gasping) And the spell fades.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Did he not have one more?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was five questions.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you sit here in the cavern, contemplating what these words mean, what the next step of your accelerated involvement in this plot, we're going to end tonight's episode. Ran a little over, guys; hundredth episode, that's a record.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What time is it? 12:41! Oh my god!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is that the longest we've ever gone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Holy shit. For those who are still here, hanging out, thank you for staying! For those who aren't, enjoy your two-parter!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A lot to unpack, there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Tune in next week for a shopping episode.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, for sure.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Critical Role goes to the beach.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Scanlan, Taryon. Wow.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Doty.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The eight characters on this side of the table.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you guys so much for watching. Thank you for being part of our hundredth episode.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you, Marvel Puzzle Quest!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So I'll see you guys in Texas!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Real soon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. Anyway, love you all. Have a wonderful night, and is it Thursday yet? Good night! [music]
